You jazz my heart, you stir my soul  

[Bridge]
They don’t make love like this no more  
You’re the sound I can't ignore  

[Outro]
So rare, so smooth, so fine  
You’ll always be that spark of mine

title: Volare (Nel blu dipinto di blu)
lyrics:
[Verse]
I dream I’m flying in the blue  
The sky wraps round like love from you  
My arms are wings, my breath is light  
You pull me into velvet night  

[Chorus]
Volare, fly with me  
Above the clouds, above the sea  
Let the stars begin to spin  
We’ll dance where dreams begin  

[Verse]
The world below can fade away  
As long as in your arms I stay  
Each word you sing becomes my sky  
And every glance lifts me high  

[Bridge]
Painted blue, my soul feels free  
Nel blu, I'm where I'm meant to be  

[Outro]
Volare, amore mio  
In your love, I rise and go

title: All I Have to Do Is Dream
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the night is dark and cold  
And there’s no one left to hold  
I just close my eyes and see  
You’re still here, right next to me  

[Chorus]
All I have to do is dream  
Feel your kiss, or hear you sing  
I may be far, but you’re so near  
When I dream, you're always here  

[Verse]
I can make the rainbows shine  
Turn back time and make you mine  
There’s no limit to what I feel  
In my dreams, it’s all so real  

[Bridge]
Daylight fades but I don’t mind  
I’ve got your love locked in my mind  

[Outro]
All I have to do is dream  
And you're mine in every scene

title: Claudette
instrumentation: electric guitar, upbeat rhythm, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Claudette, you're fire and rhythm too  
Every step you take’s a groove  
When you laugh, the jukebox plays  
You light up my rockin’ days  

[Chorus]
Claudette, come swing with me  
You’re a spark in harmony  
From the twist down to your smile  
You’ve got me jumpin’ all the while  

[Verse]
You wear your joy just like a crown  
When you’re near, I can’t slow down  
One look and I can’t forget  
That I’m in love with sweet Claudette  

[Bridge]
Even when the lights go low  
You're the beat that steals the show  

[Outro]
Claudette, oh can’t you see?  
You’re the only one for me

title: Don't
instrumentation: slow tempo, crooning male vocals, strings
lyrics:
[Verse]
Don’t say goodbye, don’t let me go  
This heart still beats for you, you know  
The night gets cold when you’re not near  
Don’t leave me standing here  

[Chorus]
Don’t turn your back, don’t close the door  
You’re the love I’m asking for  
Hold me tight, don’t let it end  
Be my lover, be my friend  

[Verse]
We’ve come too far to break apart  
Don’t tear the seams of this heart  
One word from you could make me whole  
Don’t let silence take control  

[Bridge]
I’m not too proud to beg or cry  
Just say you’ll stay, don’t say goodbye  

[Outro]
Don’t say the words I dread tonight  
Say you love me, make it right

title: I Beg of You
lyrics:
[Verse]
I beg of you, don’t say goodbye  
Let me be your lullaby  
In your eyes I see my fate  
I’m knockin’, darlin’, at your gate  

[Chorus]
I beg of you, take my hand  
Let me help you understand  
No gold or fame, just love so true  
All I want is you  

[Verse]
Don’t make me dream of love alone  
Don’t turn my heart to stone  
I’ll sing your name through rain and blue  
If you’ll just say, “I do”  

[Bridge]
I’d give you stars and all I’ve got  
But just your smile would mean a lot  

[Outro]
So darlin’, please, I beg of you  
Say our love is true

title: Witch Doctor
lyrics:
[Intro]  
I went to see a wise old man  
To help me with my master plan  
I told him that I loved a girl  
But she just made my poor head whirl

[Verse]  
He looked at me with a wild old grin  
He said, “My boy, let’s begin!”  
He mixed up potions, strange and bright  
Then shouted spells into the night!

[Chorus]  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Ting-tang, walla-walla bing-bang  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Ting-tang, walla-walla boom!

[Verse]  
He gave me charms and rabbit feet  
Told me, “Dance and tap your feet!”  
So I did the crazy dance  
Hoping I would get a chance

[Chorus]  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Ting-tang, walla-walla bing-bang  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Ting-tang, walla-walla boom!

[Bridge]  
Now I’ve got her by my side  
Thanks to that old magic guide  
She thinks I’m a charming guy  
Even though she don’t know why!

[Chorus]  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Ting-tang, walla-walla bing-bang  
Ooh-ee, ooh-ah-ah  
Thanks to the Witch Doctor’s zing-zang!

title: The Battle of New Orleans
instrumentation: banjo, snare drum, fiddle, male vocals
lyrics:
[Intro]
In 1814, we took a little trip...  

[Verse]
We marched down south with a rebel yell  
Drums were snappin’, stories to tell  
The river roared, the cannons fired  
We fought with grit and never tired  

[Chorus]
We fought the fight in New Orleans  
Through muddy banks and musket scenes  
And when the smoke began to clear  
We cheered so loud they had to hear  

[Verse]
The banjos rang with every stride  
We kept Old Glory waving wide  
They thought we’d run, but stood our ground  
Sent 'em packin’ outta town  

[Bridge]
With fiddle tunes and marching beat  
We stomped the ground with steady feet  

[Outro]
We made a mark, we stood up tall  
The Battle of New Orleans said it all

title: Mack the Knife
instrumentation: big band, brass, swinging rhythm, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Oh the shark has pretty teeth, dear  
But Mack, he hides his with a sneer  
He walks so smooth, talks so sweet  
But danger dances at his feet  

[Chorus]
Mack the Knife, he moves at night  
You won’t see him 'til he bites  
With a whisper, flash, and grin  
That’s when Mack comes slippin’ in  

[Verse]
He don’t shout, he don’t brag  
But he's the shadow with the swag  
Silk suit sharp, eyes like ice  
Mack don’t play, he rolls the dice  

[Bridge]
No one sees the way he goes  
But ask around, the story grows  

[Outro]
So watch your step and cross your heart  
Mack the Knife will play his part

title: Personality
instrumentation: piano, horns, strong rhythm section, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
You got the smile, you got the charm  
You turn the heat without alarm  
When you walk, they stop and stare  
There's magic rising in the air  

[Chorus]
You got personality, style and soul  
Make the dullest day feel whole  
Can’t explain, it’s just you  
Every move, every groove you do  

[Verse]
When you laugh, the party starts  
You’ve got the keys to every heart  
You don’t need riches, don't need fame  
Just one word and they chant your name  

[Bridge]
You're the spark the night admires  
Setting off a thousand fires  

[Outro]
You got personality, loud and clear  
You're the reason I’m still here

title: Venus
lyrics:
[Verse]
Venus, goddess from above  
Send me someone I can love  
With golden hair and eyes so kind  
Bring the love I long to find  

[Chorus]
Venus, hear this mortal plea  
Grant a heart that beats for me  
Send her down with stars and light  
Let her hold me every night  

[Verse]
I’ve waited long, I’ve dreamed in vain  
Let her ease this lonely pain  
She doesn’t need to rule or reign  
Just walk beside me through the rain  

[Bridge]
If your magic still is true  
Bring her soul, so bright and new  

[Outro]
Venus, let my wish be known  
Don't let me be alone

title: Lonely Boy
lyrics:
[Verse]
I’m just a lonely boy  
Searching for a little joy  
She left one summer afternoon  
Now I hum a broken tune  

[Chorus]
Lonely boy, cry no more  
She’s gone through that swinging door  
But the stars above still glow  
And there’s more to love to know  

[Verse]
We danced to songs on old cafés  
Now I walk through empty days  
Each echo sounds like her goodbye  
But still I look up at the sky  

[Bridge]
If she comes back, I’ll be here  
With open arms and no more fear  

[Outro]
Till then I roam with quiet grace  
Just a lonely boy in time and space

title: The Theme from 'A Summer Place'
instrumentation: orchestral strings, soft horns, lush arrangement

title: He'll Have to Go
instrumentation: baritone vocals, acoustic guitar, soft piano
lyrics:
[Verse]
Put your sweet lips a little closer to the phone  
Just pretend that we're together all alone  
Tell the man to turn the jukebox way down low  
And you can tell your friend there with you, he’ll have to go  

[Chorus]
He don’t know the things we’ve done  
All the love and all the fun  
But if your heart’s not truly mine  
Then don’t you cross that line  

[Bridge]
Though I whisper soft and low  
If you love him, then I’ll go  

[Outro]
But if you still want me so  
Just tell him he’ll have to go

title: Cathy's Clown
instrumentation: male vocal harmonies, gentle rhythm guitar
lyrics:
[Verse]
Don't want your love anymore  
Every tear I cried hit the floor  
I used to smile when you came 'round  
But now I’m just Cathy’s clown  

[Chorus]
You laugh while I fall apart  
You pulled the strings around my heart  
I gave you all, you let me down  
Now I’m walking, Cathy’s clown  

[Bridge]
Fool me once, but never twice  
You took my love, you rolled the dice  

[Outro]
Now someone else can wear the crown  
But I won't be Cathy’s clown

title: Running Bear
instrumentation: narrative vocals, rock instrumentation, backing vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
On the banks of a river wide  
Lived a brave with tribal pride  
Across the stream, a maiden fair  
With jet-black eyes and long dark hair  

[Chorus]
Running Bear, he loved so true  
But fate would not let love come through  
They cried across the waters wide  
With hearts so torn they nearly died  

[Bridge]
The river roared and skies grew black  
They swam with no path back  

[Outro]
Now side by side beneath the tide  
Running Bear and his moonlight bride

title: Teen Angel
instrumentation: male vocals, strings, slow tempo, tragic tone
lyrics:
[Verse]
Teen angel, can you hear me cry?  
You left so fast, no last goodbye  
The stars were out that fatal night  
When you drove off into the light  

[Chorus]
Teen angel, gone too soon  
Underneath the silver moon  
You saved my heart and paid the cost  
Now I must live with what I lost  

[Bridge]
I see your face in every dream  
Your voice returns like soft moonbeams  

[Outro]
Teen angel, my heart still bleeds  
For the girl who met my needs

title: Tossin' and Turnin'
genre: rhythm and blues, early soul, pop
lyrics:
[Verse]
I couldn't sleep at all last night  
The clock ticked on till morning light  
I tossed and turned, couldn’t find peace  
Till I found your love’s release  

[Chorus]
Tossin’ and turnin’, night and day  
Wishin’ you would come my way  
Can’t rest when you're not near  
Only your voice can calm my fear  

[Verse]
The pillow’s cold, the room’s too still  
Your memory’s a sleeping pill  
I’d give the world for one more kiss  
To bring me back from nights like this  

[Bridge]
Tell me what I’ve got to do  
To bring my dreams back home with you  

[Outro]
Tossin’ and turnin’, through the night  
I need your love to make it right

title: I Fall to Pieces
instrumentation: female vocals, backing harmonies, steel guitar
lyrics:
[Verse]
I fall to pieces when you call my name  
Each word reminds me of the pain  
I try to stand, pretend I’m strong  
But your love lingers all night long  

[Chorus]
I fall to pieces, every time  
Your memory plays in my mind  
You walked away, now here I stay  
Crumbling slowly day by day  

[Verse]
I smile at strangers, laugh on cue  
But inside, I'm torn in two  
No one sees the cracks I hide  
Each piece of me lost with pride  

[Bridge]
Don’t come around unless you care  
I’ve got no more strength to spare  

[Outro]
I fall to pieces, just like before  
Still waiting by that open door

title: Michael (Row the Boat Ashore)
instrumentation: acoustic guitar, male chorus, minimal percussion
lyrics:
[Verse]  
Michael, guide the boat tonight — hallelujah  
Through the stars and fading light — hallelujah  

[Verse]  
Winds are strong and waters wide — hallelujah  
But your voice will be our guide — hallelujah  

[Verse]  
Angels walk the ocean deep — hallelujah  
Singing low to those who weep — hallelujah  

[Verse]  
Every soul will find its shore — hallelujah  
When the storm can shake no more — hallelujah  

[Bridge]  
Hold the line and pull me through — hallelujah  
Michael, I put trust in you — hallelujah  

[Verse]  
Let the river wash me clean — hallelujah  
From all the hurt that I have seen — hallelujah  

[Outro]  
Michael, guide the boat tonight — hallelujah  
Bring us home to morning light — hallelujah

title: Crying
lyrics:
[Verse]
I was all right for a while  
I could smile and fake the style  
But then you walked into the room  
And tears returned with full bloom  

[Chorus]
Crying, crying in the rain  
You’re the echo in my pain  
I tried to love and let you go  
But tears are all I seem to know  

[Verse]
They say time will mend the heart  
But I’ve been breaking from the start  
Your voice still plays like a song  
A lullaby where I belong  

[Bridge]
Don’t ask me why I fall apart  
You never really left my heart  

[Outro]
Crying, silently for you  
Like I always seem to do

title: Runaway
lyrics:
[Verse]
As I walk down empty streets  
I hear the echo of your feet  
You ran from love, from all we knew  
Now I’m chasing ghosts of you  

[Chorus]
I’m a runaway from yesterday  
Lost in words you couldn’t say  
Every mile takes me back  
To the love I now lack  

[Verse]
The wind reminds me of your name  
I keep moving, but it’s the same  
No matter where I lay my head  
You're the voice inside my dread  

[Bridge]
I never thought you'd disappear  
Now I run from what I fear  

[Outro]
Runaway heart, runaway pain  
Still calling out your name

title: Stranger on the Shore
instrumentation: clarinet lead, soft strings, light rhythm section

title: I Can't Stop Loving You
lyrics:
[Verse]
I can’t stop loving you, no matter how I try  
Your memory lingers like the endless sky  
The years go by, but your face stays the same  
And every breath I take calls your name  

[Chorus]
I can’t stop loving you  
Though my heart breaks right in two  
I made up my mind to live in the past  
Where our love would always last  

[Verse]
I tried to move on, I tried to forget  
But your voice is a song I haven’t left yet  
I walk through days in a painted smile  
But miss you more with every mile  

[Bridge]
They say let go, but I hold tight  
To all the love you brought to light  

[Outro]
I can’t stop loving you  
No matter what I do

title: Mashed Potato Time
lyrics:
[Verse]
Everybody’s twistin’, now it’s my turn  
Got a brand new beat and a fire that burns  
The DJ’s spinning, crowd’s alive  
Come on and feel that jive  

[Chorus]
It’s mashed potato time  
We’re movin’ to that funky rhyme  
Kick your heels and swing your hips  
Let’s groove with every dip  

[Verse]
You don’t need rhythm, don’t need flair  
Just stomp your feet and toss your hair  
From left to right, now spin around  
Shake it down to the ground  

[Bridge]
Grab a partner, make a line  
We're gonna dance past time  

[Outro]
It’s mashed potato time  
And baby, you’re lookin’ fine

title: Roses Are Red (My Love)
lyrics:
[Verse]
Roses are red, violets are blue  
My heart wrote this just for you  
In every petal, there’s a line  
Of how I wish that you were mine  

[Chorus]
Roses are red, so is my heart  
Bleeding love since we’ve been apart  
You may forget, but I won’t change  
My love remains through joy and pain  

[Verse]
You sent a note, cold and brief  
But still I hold on to belief  
That one day soon, your love will bloom  
And fill the space inside my room  

[Bridge]
I fold the paper, read it twice  
Every word cuts like ice  

[Outro]
Roses are red, and so am I  
For loving you without goodbye

title: Surfin' USA
instrumentation: electric guitar, surf rock drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Intro]  
If everybody had some wheels out west  
They’d be skating just like me  
Cruisin’ streets and empty lots  
From sea to shining sea  

[Verse]  
We’re rollin’ down in Venice  
And glidin’ up L.A.  
Kickflippin’ out in Phoenix  
In Texas every day  
We hit up downtown Boston  
And race through NYC  
You’d see us tearin’ sidewalks  
Just skatin’ U.S.A.

[Chorus]  
We’re skatin’ U.S.A.  
Oh yeah we’re skatin’ U.S.A.  
From sunrise to the bay  
We’re skatin’ U.S.A.  

[Verse]  
They ollie out in Frisco  
They grind in Santa Fe  
They drop in down in Dayton  
And shred in Tampa Bay  
The girls are out in Austin  
With boards and neon flair  
We’re pullin’ tricks in Memphis  
With wheels flyin’ through the air  

[Chorus]  
We’re skatin’ U.S.A.  
Oh yeah we’re skatin’ U.S.A.  
From Monday through the May  
We’re skatin’ U.S.A.  

[Bridge]  
You don’t need waves or oceans  
To ride and feel the breeze  
Just pavement, speed, and motion  
And air beneath your knees  

[Outro]  
So if you see us glidin’  
Come join us any day  
We’re rollin’ free and ridin’  
We’re skatin’ U.S.A.

title: The End of the World
lyrics:
[Verse]
Why does the sun still shine above  
When you walked out on our love?  
The birds still sing, the skies are blue  
But none of that means much without you  

[Chorus]
This is the end of the world  
At least, it feels that way to this girl  
The moment you said goodbye  
I saw stars fall from the sky  

[Verse]
The flowers bloom, but I don’t smile  
Each second feels like a thousand miles  
They all go on like nothing’s wrong  
While I’m forgetting how to be strong  

[Bridge]
Is it foolish to still believe  
You might come back to me and grieve?  

[Outro]
The world still turns, but mine’s gone cold  
Without your hand to hold

title: Rhythm of the Rain
lyrics:
[Verse]
Listen to the rhythm of the rain  
Telling me I’ll never love again  
It taps the glass with aching sound  
Since you’re no longer around  

[Chorus]
The rhythm of the rain  
Knows my sorrow, knows my pain  
It cries with me each night  
In soft and silver light  

[Verse]
I told the sky about your name  
How your love left like the flame  
It weeps with me from dusk to dawn  
And I keep moving on  

[Bridge]
Raindrops whisper what I feel  
A love once true, a loss so real  

[Outro]
Listen to the rhythm of the rain  
It knows I won’t be whole again

title: He's So Fine
lyrics:
[Verse]
He walks by and hearts all flutter  
Girls lean close and shyly mutter  
He’s got that smile, that easy air  
And not a soul can help but stare  

[Chorus]
He’s so fine, I can’t ignore  
That boy’s what I’ve been waiting for  
Every step he takes, I sigh  
He don’t even have to try  

[Verse]
The way he laughs, the way he stands  
I dream of holding both his hands  
But I’m too scared to say hello  
So I just watch him come and go  

[Bridge]
If he knew how much I care  
Would he turn or just stare?  

[Outro]
He’s so fine, I hope someday  
He’ll turn around and look my way

title: Blue Velvet
lyrics:
[Intro]  
Crimson roses, soft and wild  
Like her lips when she smiled  

[Verse]  
Crimson roses in her hair  
Framed her face beyond compare  
Every time she passed me by  
The world stood still, I can’t deny  

[Verse]  
Crimson roses by her bed  
Where her sweetest words were said  
When she whispered low to me  
She bloomed like spring eternally  

[Chorus]  
I held her close in evening’s light  
She glowed beneath the stars so bright  
But seasons change, and hearts can fade  
Now only petals still remain  

[Verse]  
Crimson roses now are dry  
But I still see her in the sky  
Though she’s gone, I still believe  
She left her love for me to grieve  

[Outro]  
Crimson roses, never gray  
In my heart, they’ll stay

title: I Want to Hold Your Hand
genre: rock and roll, British Invasion, pop
lyrics:
[Verse]
Oh yeah, I tell you something  
You’ve got me running  
My heart’s on fire  
With a sweet desire  

[Chorus]
I want to hold your hand  
Walk you across this land  
With every breath I take  
It’s you I’ll never fake  

[Verse]
When you smile, I lose control  
You wrap your love around my soul  
All the world just fades away  
When I hear you say  

[Bridge]
Take my hand, don’t let go  
We’ve got more than we know  

[Outro]
I want to hold your hand  
And never let it end

title: She Loves You
lyrics:
[Verse]
You said she cried the other night  
You didn’t hold her quite so tight  
But love like hers don’t fade away  
She’s got so much left to say  

[Chorus]
She loves you, yeah yeah yeah  
You better not throw it all away  
She needs you, can’t you see?  
She’s where your heart should be  

[Verse]
You thought you'd find someone new  
But no one shines the way she do  
Take her hand, say you're sorry  
Start again, no need to worry  

[Bridge]
Don’t wait for love to slip away  
She’s yours if you just say  

[Outro]
She loves you, yeah yeah yeah  
So love her back today

title: Hello, Dolly!
instrumentation: brass, swing rhythm, gravelly male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Hello, Dolly! You’re back again  
Like a breeze through the hearts of men  
We missed your step, your classy stride  
You light this room, you swell with pride  

[Chorus]
Hello, Dolly! Raise your glass  
Time stands still when you walk past  
Every table, every eye  
Waits to catch your sweet reply  

[Verse]
We’ve danced before, let’s dance once more  
Your laugh still shakes the floor  
So don that hat and lift that smile  
Stay with us a little while  

[Bridge]
No one sings like Dolly does  
You’re the queen, forever was  

[Outro]
Hello, Dolly! Never go  
We just love you so

title: Oh, Pretty Woman
lyrics:
[Verse]
Pretty woman, walkin’ by  
Caught me with a single sigh  
Eyes like fire, lips like wine  
You got me dreamin’ overtime  

[Chorus]
Oh, pretty woman, can’t you see?  
You’re the one who sets me free  
Just one glance, and now I know  
You’re the star in every show  

[Verse]
Don’t pass me like a summer breeze  
Come say hello, come put me at ease  
You’ve got that look, that mystery  
And darlin’, you belong with me  

[Bridge]
Even angels stop and stare  
When you walk with style and flair  

[Outro]
Oh, pretty woman, say you will  
Stay with me and time stands still

title: I Get Around
instrumentation: guitar, surf rock rhythm, harmonized vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
I jump in the ride and cruise the town  
From the beach to the strip, I get around  
Engine roars and the tires spin  
Every night’s a new begin  

[Chorus]
I get around, I make my scene  
From the boulevard to the movie screen  
With the windows down and music loud  
I move fast and live proud  

[Verse]
The girls all smile, the guys all nod  
I’m known from Venice down to Cape Cod  
Surfboard strapped, ready to go  
Speedin’ off with style and glow  

[Bridge]
You can’t catch me, I’m never still  
Movin’ through life by sheer will  

[Outro]
I get around, it’s what I do  
Racing with the sun in view

title: Wooly Bully
artist: Sam the Sham and the Pharaohs
lyrics:
[Verse]
Wooly Bully’s got the groove  
Makes your body wanna move  
With a stomp and twist and shout  
We’re gonna turn this party out  

[Chorus]
Wooly Bully, dance all night  
Spin around and hold on tight  
Forget your worries, jump in line  
Wooly Bully's feelin’ fine  

[Verse]
Sam told Matty not to wait  
Said get down and shake that fate  
It’s not about how you look  
It’s the rhythm that you cook  

[Bridge]
It don’t matter what you wear  
Long as you got moves to share  

[Outro]
Wooly Bully, here we go  
Let that wild energy flow

title: I Can't Help Myself (Sugar Pie Honey Bunch)
lyrics:
[Verse]
Sugar pie, honey bunch  
You’re the reason I skip lunch  
Can’t think straight, can’t stay cool  
Every time, I act a fool  

[Chorus]
I can’t help myself  
You're my weakness and my wealth  
You got me under your spell  
And I can’t break it, can’t you tell?  

[Verse]
I try to walk away each time  
But your voice just rewinds my mind  
No other girl makes me feel  
The kind of love that feels so real  

[Bridge]
Don’t blame me if I stay  
Your sweet touch leads the way  

[Outro]
Sugar pie, honey bunch  
You’ve got me in your clutch

title: (I Can't Get No) Satisfaction
instrumentation: electric guitar riff, drums, raw vocals
lyrics:
[Intro]  
I can’t make no…  
No connection  

[Verse]  
I turn the dial, I hear the noise  
Selling lies to all the boys  
They talk so slick, they sell the dream  
But nothing’s ever what it seems  

[Chorus]  
I can’t make no… no connection  
I can’t fake no… true affection  
And I try, and I try, and I try, and I try  
But I can’t make no  
I can’t make no connection  

[Verse]  
I walk the street, they pass me by  
With empty smiles and plastic eyes  
They say “be cool, just play the game”  
But I don’t want to look the same  

[Chorus]  
I can’t make no… no connection  
I can’t shake no… disaffection  
And I try, and I try, and I try, and I try  
But I can’t make no  
I can’t make no connection  

[Bridge]  
They keep on telling me  
What I should feel and be  
But I got questions they can’t fix  
Just more rules and dirty tricks  

[Verse]  
I write my name in city smoke  
But truth’s just some kind of joke  
I scream it loud into the air  
Still no one knows I’m even there  

[Chorus]  
I can’t make no… no connection  
I can’t break no… misdirection  
And I try, and I try, and I try, and I try  
But I can’t make no  
No connection

title: You Were On My Mind
instrumentation: folk guitar, soft percussion, vocal harmony
lyrics:
[Intro]  
I woke up early with the sun in my eyes  
And I couldn’t find my peace  

[Verse]  
I walked through morning in a broken daze  
Thought I left behind those cloudy days  
But every step brought your name back strong  
I knew I couldn’t last too long  

[Chorus]  
You were in my mind  
Everywhere I’d go  
Like a song I used to know  
You were in my mind  
Couldn’t let you be  
You were haunting every part of me  

[Verse]  
Tried to drown it out in city sounds  
Tried to chase it when the sun went down  
But your face was always near  
In every laugh, in every tear  

[Bridge]  
I said I’d move on, and I tried  
But even freedom feels like a lie  

[Chorus]  
You were in my mind  
Everywhere I’d go  
Like a flame that wouldn’t slow  
You were in my mind  
Like a restless sea  
No matter what, you followed me  

[Outro]  
I couldn’t find my peace  
No, I couldn’t find my peace  
You were in my mind

title: You've Lost That Lovin' Feelin'
lyrics:
[Verse]
You used to hold me close each night  
Now your touch don’t feel quite right  
There’s silence where your smile should be  
And you don’t even look at me  

[Chorus]
You’ve lost that lovin’ feelin’  
And it’s breakin’ me apart  
You’ve lost that lovin’ feelin’  
And it’s crushin’ on my heart  

[Verse]
The fire’s dim, the spark is gone  
We’re out of sync, we’re out of song  
I call your name and hear the wind  
A love that’s driftin’ in the end  

[Bridge]
Baby, bring it back again  
We can start where we began  

[Outro]
You’ve lost that lovin’ feelin’  
But I still remember when

title: California Dreamin'
lyrics:
[Verse]
I stepped into a world of gray  
With sunlight trapped so far away  
The wind was cold, the sky was wide  
But dreams of warmth were locked inside  

[Chorus]
California dreamin’, every single night  
Wishing for the golden light  
Walking through the silent snow  
But my heart’s where the palm trees grow  

[Verse]
I passed the church with doors of stone  
But in my chest, I felt alone  
I whispered prayers I couldn't speak  
Longing for the coast and heat  

[Bridge]
If I could fly beyond this chill  
I’d trade this frost for every thrill  

[Outro]
California dreamin’, holding on so tight  
To the color in the fading light

title: 96 Tears
lyrics:
[Verse]
You said goodbye with a grin  
Left me where the pain begins  
Now I’m counting every sigh  
Since you kissed this love goodbye  

[Chorus]
Ninety-six tears down my face  
Since you left without a trace  
Heartbreak hangs like chandelier  
Every drop, a crystal clear  

[Verse]
I told myself I’d be strong  
But the days feel twice as long  
Tried to laugh, but truth appears  
And I’m drowning in my tears  

[Bridge]
You’ll come back when you’re alone  
But I won’t pick up that phone  

[Outro]
Ninety-six tears, still I cry  
Even love must say goodbye

title: What Becomes Of The Brokenhearted
lyrics:
[Verse]
What becomes of a love gone wrong  
When nights feel twice as long?  
The smile you gave is just a ghost  
And hope’s the thing I miss the most  

[Chorus]
What becomes of the brokenhearted?  
Left behind, torn apart and started  
Walking down a one-way street  
With echoes where our hearts would meet  

[Verse]
I’ve tried to laugh, I’ve tried to mend  
But each day starts where dreams end  
The world keeps turning, unaware  
That I still look, but you’re not there  

[Bridge]
Maybe love is just a flame  
That burns too fast to leave a name  

[Outro]
What becomes of the ones who care?  
We carry love that isn’t there

title: Last Train to Clarksville
instrumentation: electric guitar, pop drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Catchin' the last train out of town  
Before the sun goes down  
Left a note on your pillowcase  
Said I'm leavin' without a trace  

[Chorus]
Meet me at the station, don’t be late  
There’s no time left to hesitate  
Clarksville’s callin’, tracks are loud  
But I still want you in the crowd  

[Verse]
Suitcase rattles, heartbeats race  
I still see your face  
Every mile just pulls me near  
I need your voice to calm my fear  

[Bridge]
Don't know when I’ll be back again  
But hold me close until then  

[Outro]
One last ride, one last chance  
Let’s run away, not miss the dance

title: Reach Out I'll Be There
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the night feels cold and long  
And the world has done you wrong  
Just call my name, I’ll hear your cry  
I’ll be the wings when you can't fly  

[Chorus]
Reach out, I’ll be there  
Through the storm and every care  
You don’t have to face it all  
I’ll catch you if you fall  

[Verse]
No mountain’s too steep, no ocean wide  
That I won’t cross to be your guide  
I’ll light the dark, I’ll ease the pain  
Like sunshine after rain  

[Bridge]
I’m not just words, I’m truly near  
Just speak and I’ll appear  

[Outro]
Reach out, I’ll be there  
With love beyond compare

title: To Sir With Love
lyrics:
[Verse]
How do you thank someone  
Who took your hand when you had none?  
Taught me more than books could do  
With every look, you pulled me through  

[Chorus]
To sir, with love, I raise my voice  
You helped me see I had a choice  
The lessons lived, not just taught  
A wiser soul your guidance brought  

[Verse]
From trembling steps to standing tall  
You saw the beauty in it all  
And now I walk with pride and grace  
Because you showed me my own place  

[Bridge]
You gave me dreams I never dared  
A voice that spoke because you cared  

[Outro]
So if goodbye must come today  
I thank you more than words can say

title: The Letter
lyrics:
[Verse]
Gimme a ticket for an aeroplane  
Got no time to take the train  
My baby wrote, said come back soon  
Now I’m flying to that tune  

[Chorus]
The letter said she still believes  
She’s waitin’ there beneath the eaves  
One piece of paper, black and blue  
Told me what I had to do  

[Verse]
I read her words a thousand times  
Each line ringing like chimes  
She said, “Come home, don’t delay  
I miss you more with each day”  

[Bridge]
No more nights alone for me  
Her words set my heart free  

[Outro]
The letter brought her voice so near  
Now I’m coming home, my dear

title: Ode to Billie Joe
lyrics:
[Verse]
It was the third of June, another sleepy day  
Dust on the porch, the sky all gray  
Mama cooking, radio hums  
Talkin’ ‘bout the bridge and what’s become  

[Chorus]
Ode to Billie Joe, a tale of loss  
A boy who vanished, paid the cost  
No one said just what he feared  
But we all wept when he disappeared  

[Verse]
Pass the biscuits, change the tune  
But that silence filled the room  
We all pretend we didn’t see  
What Billie Joe meant to me  

[Bridge]
Some secrets float like ghostly rain  
Fallin’ soft on windowpanes  

[Outro]
Ode to Billie Joe remains  
A whisper through forgotten names

title: Windy
lyrics:
[Verse]
Who's walkin' down the street so fine?  
Spinnin’ like a breeze through time  
Hair like sunlight, heart so free  
Windy’s all I want to see  

[Chorus]
Windy dances where she goes  
Lifts the clouds and melts the snows  
With a laugh she shifts the air  
Leaves a sparkle everywhere  

[Verse]
She don’t speak, she sings instead  
With every glance, my doubts are shed  
She’s the music, she’s the light  
Windy makes the world feel right  

[Bridge]
Even shadows disappear  
When Windy’s whispering near  

[Outro]
Windy, won’t you stay with me?  
You’re the calm and energy

title: I'm a Believer
instrumentation: electric guitar, pop drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
I thought love was just pretend  
A broken road that wouldn’t mend  
But then you came, and now I see  
There’s more to life than fantasy  

[Chorus]
I’m a believer, now I know  
Your love can make my spirit grow  
No more doubts, no more lies  
You put the starlight in my skies  

[Verse]
I used to laugh when lovers sighed  
But you unlocked what I denied  
With every word and every kiss  
You showed me what true magic is  

[Bridge]
Now I’m the fool who sings out loud  
Head held high and heart so proud  

[Outro]
I’m a believer, yes it’s true  
And it’s all because of you

title: Hey Jude
lyrics:
[Verse]
Hey Jude, don’t feel afraid  
You’ve got the strength you’ve always made  
Take a sad song, make it glow  
And let your broken heart still grow  

[Chorus]
Hey Jude, the world’s your stage  
Turn the sorrow into rage  
Don’t carry pain that you outgrew  
You’ve got more love than you ever knew  

[Verse]
The night may try to pull you in  
But let the sunrise kiss your skin  
You’re not alone, we sing along  
To every word that makes you strong  

[Bridge]
La-la-la-la, life goes on  
With every step, you’ll find where you belong  

[Outro]
Hey Jude, keep moving on  
You’re the reason for this song

title: Honey
lyrics:
[Verse]
She used to laugh beneath the trees  
Chasing sunlight through the breeze  
Planted flowers just to smile  
And sat with me a little while  

[Chorus]
Honey, sweet and soft and true  
Every day I’m missing you  
Gone too soon, you flew away  
But love like yours will always stay  

[Verse]
She hummed to songs I never knew  
Made cloudy skies feel bright and new  
And now I walk those paths alone  
Still hearing echoes from our home  

[Bridge]
Time may pass, but won’t erase  
Her gentle hands, her warming face  

[Outro]
Honey, you're my yesterday  
And still my heart today

title: (Sittin' On) The Dock of the Bay
lyrics:
[Verse]  
Sittin’ here under clouds of gray  
Watchin’ the people drift away  
Rain keeps fallin’ on my knees  
But I don’t mind, I’m feelin’ free  

[Chorus]  
I’m just wastin’ time in the rain  
Tryna wash off all my pain  
I’ve been runnin’, I’ve been tryin’  
But now I’m just sit-in’ still and dryin’  

[Verse]  
Left my home and my worn-out shoes  
Chasin’ dreams I was bound to lose  
City lights never showed me love  
Just neon signs and skies above  

[Chorus]  
So I’m wastin’ time in the rain  
Let it fall and let it stain  
Ain’t no riches, ain’t no name  
But peace don’t come with fame  

[Bridge]  
Maybe one day I’ll move again  
But right now I’m my only friend  
I’ve got this bench, I’ve got this sound  
Of the rain beatin’ on the ground  

[Outro]  
Wastin’ time in the rain,  
Let it wash away my name  
I’ll sit here till I fade  
With nothin’ left to trade

title: People Got to Be Free
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every soul deserves to shine  
To walk with love, to cross the line  
We were born to lift each other  
To see all strangers as our brother  

[Chorus]
People got to be free  
To speak, to love, to simply be  
Tear the fences, break the chains  
Let compassion guide the reins  

[Verse]
Voices rise across the land  
Asking only for a hand  
No more fear, no more divide  
We are one when love’s our guide  

[Bridge]
Freedom ain’t just for the few  
It starts with me and lives in you  

[Outro]
People got to be free  
And that begins with you and me

title: Sugar, Sugar
lyrics:
[Verse]
Sugar, sugar, you taste so sweet  
With every kiss, you bring the heat  
You're the candy in my jar  
The sweetest thing by far  

[Chorus]
Sugar, you light me up  
You’re my honey, you fill my cup  
Can’t get enough of your love  
You fit me like a velvet glove  

[Verse]
You're the buzz I crave each day  
The sunshine that don’t go away  
When I feel your sugar high  
All my worries say goodbye  

[Bridge]
Pour your love right into me  
Like syrup in my morning tea  

[Outro]
Sugar, sugar, stay awhile  
You’re the reason I smile

title: Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In (The Flesh Failures)
instrumentation: orchestral pop, layered vocals, psychedelic sounds
lyrics:
[Intro]  
When the stars align as one  
And the rivers meet the sun  
When the night forgets to stay  
A brand new time will find its way  

[Verse]  
This is the age of the open soul  
When love and truth will take control  
When hearts connect across the land  
And no one’s left to make a stand  

[Chorus]  
Awakening, it’s in the sky  
Rising now, so don’t ask why  
The veil is gone, we’re looking clear  
A world reborn is drawing near  

[Verse]  
We've been lost in fear too long  
Hiding what we know is wrong  
Now the dawn begins to sing  
And the bells of change will ring  

[Chorus]  
Open up the light  
Let the bright shine in  
Open up the light  
Let the bright shine in  

[Bridge]  
Let it shine on you! (Let it shine on you!)  
Let it shine on me! (Let it shine on me!)  
Let it shine on love! (Let it shine on love!)  
Let us all be free! (Let us all be free!)

[Chorus]  
Open up the light  
Let the bright shine in  
Let the bright  
Shine in

title: I Can't Get Next to You
instrumentation: funky bass, soul vocals, driving rhythm
lyrics:
[Verse]
You see me try, you see me cry  
But you just keep on walking by  
I can move a mountain, touch the sky  
But I still can't make you reply  

[Chorus]
I can't get next to you  
No matter what I do  
You light my soul and then walk through  
I can’t break the space between us two  

[Verse]
I could turn rain to summer fire  
But you won't give in to desire  
I call your name, you just pretend  
Like we were never more than friends  

[Bridge]
I’ve done it all to catch your glance  
Still you won't give me a chance  

[Outro]
I can't get next to you  
But I'm still trying, it's true

title: Honky Tonk Women
lyrics:
[Verse]
She walked in with boots and grace  
Whiskey smile, a wild pace  
Said she came from Baton Rouge  
And lit the bar like neon fuse  

[Chorus]
Honky tonk women, play it loud  
They own the night, they draw a crowd  
With a laugh and a look so bold  
They’ll steal your heart and leave you cold  

[Verse]
She took my hand, said let’s get lost  
No time to think, just pay the cost  
She danced me out past closing time  
And left me stranded with no sign  

[Bridge]
You can’t hold a woman like that  
She’s a storm in a cowboy hat  

[Outro]
Honky tonk women, come and go  
But they burn you down just so you know

title: Everyday People
lyrics:
[Verse]
I am no better, you are no less  
We all carry different kinds of stress  
Short or tall, dark or light  
We’re all reaching for the same daylight  

[Chorus]
Everyday people, side by side  
In every city, every tide  
We laugh, we cry, we all believe  
In something we hope to achieve  

[Verse]
You may wear a different name  
But your dreams still burn the same  
So let’s not build a wall of shame  
Let’s play a brand new game  

[Bridge]
Hold my hand and lift your voice  
In love and peace, we all rejoice  

[Outro]
Everyday people, one and true  
And that includes me and you

title: Bridge Over Troubled Water
lyrics:
[Verse]
When you're weary, feeling small  
When tears come down like rainfall  
I'll be the calm beyond your tide  
A hand in yours, right by your side  

[Chorus]
Like a bridge over troubled water  
I will ease your mind  
Like a bridge over troubled water  
I will help you find  

[Verse]
When shadows fall and friends are few  
My light will still shine on you  
I’ll carry you when strength is gone  
Together, we keep holding on  

[Bridge]
In storms or silence, I remain  
A quiet song through all your pain  

[Outro]
Like a bridge over troubled water  
I will see you through

title: (They Long To Be) Close To You
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every time the sun begins to rise  
I see reflections of you in the skies  
Birds start to sing, the breeze turns new  
All because I’m close to you  

[Chorus]
Why do stars fall down from blue?  
It’s just the world longing for you  
They long to be, like me, close to you  

[Verse]
The gentle way you say my name  
Turns every day into a flame  
Of something pure, something true  
That only lives when I’m with you  

[Bridge]
Every heartbeat finds its cue  
In rhythm just to be with you  

[Outro]
They long to be, like me, close to you

title: American Woman
lyrics:
[Verse]
American woman, don’t come knockin’  
I’m done with your chains and talkin’  
Your polished smile, your plastic pride  
Don’t fit the rebel that I hide  

[Chorus]
American woman, get away from me  
Let me be wild and let me be free  
You want control, but I won’t stay  
I’ve found my soul and walked away  

[Verse]
You dress in red, white, and gold  
But underneath, your heart feels cold  
You sell me dreams you never keep  
I’m waking now, I won’t sleep  

[Bridge]
I need the fire, not the mask  
Someone real, that’s all I ask  

[Outro]
American woman, I’m movin’ on  
The fight inside me's never gone

title: Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Head
lyrics:
[Verse]
Raindrops keep fallin’ on my head  
But that don’t mean my soul is filled with dread  
The sky can pour, but I’ll still sing  
‘Cause life’s a funny little thing  

[Chorus]
Raindrops keep fallin’, but I smile  
They won’t last, just wait awhile  
No use complainin’ when skies are gray  
The sun will find another way  

[Verse]
I used to fear the thunder's sound  
But now I dance on soggy ground  
Each drop’s a tune, a beat, a breeze  
That shakes me loose and sets me free  

[Bridge]
Storms may visit, winds may sigh  
But I won’t let ‘em dim my sky  

[Outro]
Raindrops fall, but I won’t cry  
There’s a rainbow hangin’ high

title: War
instrumentation: funky brass, heavy drums, shouted vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
War, what is it good for?  
It breaks the soul, it locks the door  
Leaves the young without a choice  
Silences the weakest voice  

[Chorus]
War! Ain’t no reason, ain’t no rhyme  
It steals your love, it steals your time  
Say it loud, we’ve had enough  
The cost of war is way too tough  

[Verse]
Marching boots don’t bring us peace  
They crush the ground, and love’s released  
Through broken glass and mothers’ tears  
We count the days, we count the years  

[Bridge]
Raise your fists but raise your heart  
The real revolution’s where we start  

[Outro]
War—no more, we’ve drawn the line  
Let’s build a world by love, not sign

title: Joy To The World
lyrics:
[Verse]  
Woke up laughing in the rain  
Shook off trouble, danced through pain  
Every stranger, every friend  
Sang a song that had no end  

[Chorus]  
Joy to the world, we’ll sing it loud  
Raise your hands above the crowd  
Let the rivers roll with light  
Turn the darkness into bright  

[Verse]  
Found a rhythm in the street  
Heard the music in our feet  
Even hearts that lost their way  
Found a voice in what we play  

[Bridge]  
It don’t matter who you’ve been  
Love will let the light back in  

[Outro]  
Joy to the world, joy to the skies  
To the laughter in our eyes

title: Maggie May
lyrics:
[Verse]
Wake up, Maggie, I think I’ve said
Too much with silence, not enough with tread
You took my heart, then gave it back
But now I’m standing on the track

[Chorus]
Maggie May, I played the fool
Thought I was wise, thought I was cool
But now I see you had your say
While I watched time drift away

[Verse]
I packed my things, I left your bed
Your perfume lingers in my head
The records spin but I can’t hear
A voice so soft, then disappeared

[Bridge]
You broke the boy, but made the man
In ways I’ll never understand

[Outro]
Maggie May, this is goodbye
But I won’t forget your sky

title: Reason to Believe
instrumentation: acoustic guitar, soft vocals, slow tempo
lyrics:
[Verse]  
I saw you cry and say you’re fine  
But silence drew another line  
You smiled and I believed again  
Though I knew how it would end  

[Chorus]  
Still I find a reason to believe  
Even when your words deceive  
It’s not hope that makes me stay  
It’s the ghost of yesterday  

[Verse]  
I held you close through fading years  
My hands still full of old ideas  
Each promise made, each story spun  
Still stings beneath the setting sun  

[Bridge]  
Maybe lies are just a thread  
That keep old memories from the dead  

[Outro]  
Reason to believe, though it’s untrue  
I still find it — all in you

title: I Feel the Earth Move
lyrics:
[Verse]  
I feel the earth move under my skin  
Like something wild’s about to begin  
You touch my hand, the sky goes black  
Then explodes and pulls me back  

[Chorus]  
I feel the earth move, don’t you see?  
Every time you get close to me  
Tremors roll and pulses race  
You shake the ground with just your face  

[Verse]  
The walls all bend, the lights all spin  
My calm collapses from within  
You light the fire and break the seal  
Make it too hard not to feel  

[Bridge]  
Baby, you're a tidal wave  
Knocking down what I can’t save  

[Outro]  
I feel the earth move — deep and wide  
When you’re standing by my side

title: It's Too Late
lyrics:
[Verse]
We tried to hold what couldn’t stay
Watched love grow quiet, drift away
We shared the truth without the flame
And walked away without the blame

[Chorus]
It’s too late, we can’t go back
Time rolled on without a track
The words are soft, the nights are still
But we can’t change the way we feel

[Verse]
You used to wait at midnight’s call
Now silence dances through the hall
We smile like we both understand
Love sometimes slips right through your hand

[Bridge]
It wasn’t wrong, it wasn’t right
Just a moment lost to night

[Outro]
It’s too late for us to mend
But thank you for being more than friend

title: One Bad Apple
instrumentation: funky rhythm, harmonized vocals, pop instrumentation
lyrics:
[Verse]
Don’t judge me for the one before
She closed her heart, then slammed the door
But I ain’t her, I’m standing true
I’d never put that hurt on you

[Chorus]
One bad apple don’t spoil the tree
Take a chance and fall with me
I’ve got love, not games to play
So let’s start fresh today

[Verse]
You look away like you’ve been burned
Afraid to trust, too much you’ve learned
But I’ve got patience, I’ve got time
To prove to you this heart is mine

[Bridge]
You’ve got bruises, I’ve got grace
Let me bring a sweeter taste

[Outro]
One bad apple came and went
But I’m the one who’s heaven-sent

title: How Can You Mend a Broken Heart
instrumentation: orchestral strings, soft drums, falsetto male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
How do you fix what you can't see?
A soul undone, a quiet plea
I watch the world just spin around
While I can’t lift from off the ground

[Chorus]
How can you mend a broken heart?
When love is gone, where do you start?
The pieces don’t fit like they used to
And I’m left wondering what to do

[Verse]
The laughter echoes from before
But now it hurts me even more
You walked away, I stayed behind
With nothing left but silent time

[Bridge]
I reach for you in every dream
But wake to silence in between

[Outro]
How can you mend a heart like mine?
When healing needs more than time

title: The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face
lyrics:
[Verse]
The first time ever I saw your face  
The world stood still in quiet grace  
No word could reach what I had found  
Your gaze alone could shake the ground  

[Chorus]
I knew then what forever meant  
In that one moment, heaven sent  
You held the stars within your eyes  
And turned my silence into skies  

[Verse]
The first time ever you touched my hand  
The earth became a softer land  
No fear, no doubt, just endless peace  
And all my ghosts were released  

[Bridge]
Time could pass and oceans roam  
But you, my heart, will be my home  

[Outro]
The first time ever I saw your face  
Love began its sweetest chase

title: Alone Again (Naturally)
lyrics:
[Verse]
I stood and watched the door close tight  
No words, no chance to make it right  
The laughter faded into air  
And I was left with no one there  

[Chorus]
Alone again, naturally  
The world forgot to wait for me  
I tried to smile through broken glass  
But memories hold on so fast  

[Verse]
I questioned why the good ones leave  
While sorrow teaches us to grieve  
I held the past in trembling hands  
And wished for someone who understands  

[Bridge]
Faith can fall, and hope feels thin  
But I still breathe and start again  

[Outro]
Alone again, maybe true  
But someday I’ll believe in new

title: American Pie
instrumentation: acoustic guitar, piano, vocals with narrative tone
lyrics:
[Intro]
A long, long time ago, I can still remember how that music made me smile...

[Verse]
I read the news on a winter's day  
The songs we loved had slipped away  
No more guitars to fill the night  
Just silent halls and neon light  

[Chorus]
Bye, bye, the songs we used to know  
Drove our dreams through the dust and snow  
And though the rhythm’s gone from the sky  
We’ll still remember, we won’t say goodbye  

[Verse]
The jester laughed, the poet cried  
The crowd grew still, the groove had died  
But we held hands, still swaying slow  
To songs from years and lives ago  

[Bridge]
It wasn’t just a melody  
It was the sound of you and me  

[Outro]
So bye, bye, to that sweet refrain  
Till we hear those chords again

title: Without You
lyrics:
[Verse]
No stars tonight, no morning light  
Since you walked out, nothing feels right  
I reach for you in empty space  
And only find the air's embrace  

[Chorus]
I can't live, if living is without you  
Every breath just pulls me through  
You were the song, the only truth  
And now I'm lost in all I knew  

[Verse]
The mirror shows a different face  
One touched by time and love's disgrace  
But I'd give all to hold your gaze  
And bring back those golden days  

[Bridge]
Love’s a flame that won’t die down  
Even when no one's around  

[Outro]
I can't live, and yet I try  
But I still break, and I still cry

title: The Candy Man
instrumentation: orchestral arrangement, male vocals, backing chorus
lyrics:
[Intro]  
Who can twist the sunshine?  
Sprinkle joy on everything?  
Wrap a smile in laughter?  
The Bubblegum King!

[Verse]  
He’s got pockets full of color  
Shoelaces made of sweets  
He skips around the corner  
Tappin’ rhythms with his feet  
When he sings, the sky gets brighter  
Birds all start to swing  
You know it’s not just anyone  
It’s the Bubblegum King!

[Chorus]  
Oh, the Bubblegum King can (yes he can!)  
He can take your frown and turn it ‘round again  
With a pop and a grin and a song from within  
He’ll lift your day like helium wind  

[Bridge]  
Don’t need no gold, no diamond things  
Just bubble wrap and jelly wings  
He’s got a heart that’s sugar-spun  
And bounces joy to everyone!

[Chorus]  
Oh, the Bubblegum King can (yes indeed!)  
He’s got every happy thing you need  
From peppermint hats to chocolate shoes  
He gives the world the sweetest news  

[Outro]  
So if you feel blue and gray  
Let the Bubblegum King save your day!

title: Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
lyrics:
[Verse]
I’ve been gone for far too long  
Felt every mile, wrote every song  
Now I’m coming back to see  
If you’ve been waiting still for me  

[Chorus]
Tie a yellow ribbon ‘round the ole oak tree  
If you still care, if you still want me  
One ribbon means I’m welcome home  
If not, I’ll keep moving on alone  

[Verse]
The road was hard, the nights were cold  
But your memory, it took hold  
I dreamed of you and that old porch swing  
Of second chances love can bring  

[Bridge]
The bus is near, I hold my breath  
Will I find love or find regret?  

[Outro]
Tie that ribbon if you believe  
And I’ll never again leave

title: Bad, Bad Leroy Brown
lyrics:
[Verse]
Down in the South Side of the town  
Leroy Brown came struttin’ ‘round  
Diamond rings and custom shoes  
He never cared what he could lose  

[Chorus]
He’s bad, bad Leroy Brown  
Baddest man to come around  
Meaner than a junkyard dog  
Drinks his whiskey, rolls in fog  

[Verse]
He played his cards with no regret  
And left a trail of unpaid debt  
Took your girl and took your pride  
Then vanished with a crooked smile  

[Bridge]
But one day he met his match  
A shadow quick enough to catch  

[Outro]
Now folks just talk about Leroy Brown  
The legend who once ruled the town

title: Killing Me Softly with His Song
lyrics:
[Verse]
He sang a tune so soft and low  
Told stories only hearts could know  
Each word a ribbon round my chest  
A quiet storm I can't suppress  

[Chorus]
Killing me softly with his song  
Every note feels deep and long  
He doesn’t know he holds my pain  
But still I listen once again  

[Verse]
His fingers dance across the keys  
My sorrow rides the gentle breeze  
He weaves the truth I try to hide  
And brings it pouring from inside  

[Bridge]
No spotlight knows my name  
But he sees me just the same  

[Outro]
Killing me softly, line by line  
He stole the hurt and made it mine

title: Let's Get It On
lyrics:
[Verse]
We’ve waited long, we’ve waited slow  
Now let the rhythm take control  
You touch my hand, I feel the flame  
No more games, no more shame  

[Chorus]
Let’s get it on, just you and me  
Let passion set our spirits free  
No need to talk, just feel the night  
And hold me close till morning light  

[Verse]
The world can fade, the time can pause  
Let’s break the rules, rewrite the laws  
Your eyes are stars, your skin the spark  
Let’s love like fire in the dark  

[Bridge]
Don’t hesitate, don’t say a word  
Just move with me and feel the surge  

[Outro]
Let’s get it on, and let it stay  
Like love was made for us today

title: My Love
lyrics:
[Verse]
My love is more than words can say  
She lights my sky and guides my way  
With every smile, she lifts me high  
She paints the dawn across my sky  

[Chorus]
My love, she walks in quiet grace  
Turns every room to sacred space  
With just one glance, she speaks the truth  
And makes me feel eternal youth  

[Verse]
Through every storm, she holds my hand  
And makes me feel I understand  
The kind of love that doesn’t fade  
But deepens every choice we’ve made  

[Bridge]
No song could hold her name just right  
She is the day, she is the night  

[Outro]
My love, forever she will be  
The soul that walks this world with me

title: The Way We Were
lyrics:
[Verse]
Memories drift like autumn leaves  
Of golden days and silent eves  
A touch, a glance, a whispered word  
Now echoes I have barely heard  

[Chorus]
The way we were, so bright, so bold  
Before the nights turned dark and cold  
If I could turn the hands of time  
I'd hold you close and make you mine  

[Verse]
We smiled through storms and kissed through rain  
But now I walk with quiet pain  
Your voice still lingers in my mind  
A love so rare, so hard to find  

[Bridge]
We let it go, not knowing why  
But still I miss your last goodbye  

[Outro]
The way we were lives in my soul  
A love once young that made me whole

title: Seasons in the Sun
lyrics:
[Verse]
Goodbye my friend, it’s time to part  
But know you’ll always have my heart  
We climbed the hills, we chased the wind  
Now I must go where journeys end  

[Chorus]
We had joy, we had fun  
We had seasons in the sun  
But like the tide that comes and goes  
Our story’s written in the snow  

[Verse]
Goodbye to love that made me shine  
To laughs that echoed through the pines  
I’ll carry all those days with grace  
And smile whenever I see your face  

[Bridge]
No regrets, just one more song  
To say I loved you all along  

[Outro]
We had seasons, we had sun  
And now my time has come and gone

title: Come and Get Your Love
lyrics:
[Verse]
Hey now, what’s the matter with your heart?  
You’ve been hiding, falling apart  
Come step into this groove with me  
Let go, baby, and just be free  

[Chorus]
Come and get your love  
You don’t have to push or shove  
I’ve got enough to go around  
Let’s lift this love up off the ground  

[Verse]
You don’t need makeup or disguise  
I see the fire behind your eyes  
So stop pretending you don’t feel  
This beat is strong, this love is real  

[Bridge]
Don’t wait, don’t hesitate  
We’ve got the rhythm, now don’t be late  

[Outro]
Come and get your love tonight  
We’ll dance until the morning light

title: Dancing Machine
lyrics:
[Verse]
She walks in with electric flair  
Turns the music into air  
Every eye is locked in place  
She moves with rhythm, style, and grace  

[Chorus]
Dancing machine, light on her feet  
She makes the pulse skip every beat  
Twist and spin, a living flame  
No one else can play her game  

[Verse]
From the disco floor to neon skies  
She takes you high, she makes you fly  
Not a word, just silent heat  
Every move is sweet defeat  

[Bridge]
You can’t touch what moves so fast  
Just feel her fire as she blasts  

[Outro]
Dancing machine, take the lead  
You’re the only dance I need

title: Love Will Keep Us Together
lyrics:
[Verse]
They talk and try to tear us down  
But we keep rising off the ground  
No storm can shake the faith we hold  
Our love is fire, burning bold  

[Chorus]
Love will keep us together  
Through any storm, through any weather  
Even when the nights get long  
Our hearts still beat this faithful song  

[Verse]
You and me, we’ve been through time  
Every scar just proves the climb  
So let them doubt, and let them say  
We’re only growing every day  

[Bridge]
Hold me close and don’t let go  
You're the only truth I know  

[Outro]
Love will keep us strong and free  
You and I, eternally

title: Rhinestone Cowboy
lyrics:
[Verse]
I walk these streets with dreams in tow  
A quiet name, a steady glow  
The flashing lights don’t know my name  
But I keep riding just the same  

[Chorus]
Like a rhinestone cowboy  
Chasing lights through smoke and noise  
Riding high on dreams and grace  
Still smiling through this worn-out face  

[Verse]
They laugh at hope, they mock the tune  
But I keep dancing to my moon  
I’ve worn out boots, but not my pride  
With every fall, I still ride  

[Bridge]
Fame may come or pass me by  
But I’ll keep reaching for the sky  

[Outro]
I’m just a rhinestone cowboy  
But this dream will never die

title: Philadelphia Freedom
lyrics:
[Verse]
City lights and flags that wave  
I’ve found the strength I need to save  
Through every block and every song  
This city's heartbeat makes me strong  

[Chorus]
Philadelphia freedom, my soul's release  
Running wild in streets of peace  
Raise your hands, feel the sound  
Love and rhythm all around  

[Verse]
I don’t need no crown or throne  
This town of dreams is all my own  
With every cheer and every fight  
We dance beneath the liberty light  

[Bridge]
From riverside to neon signs  
This city’s pulse beats in my lines  

[Outro]
Philadelphia freedom, I won’t let go  
You lift me high, you make me glow

title: Before the Next Teardrop Falls
lyrics:
[Verse]
If he breaks your heart again  
If you need a softer friend  
I’ll be here with open arms  
To pull you safe from all harm  

[Chorus]
Before the next teardrop falls  
I’ll catch your sorrow as it calls  
No need to face the night alone  
I’ll guide you gently back home  

[Verse]
If he forgets the way you shine  
Just know your light is always mine  
I won’t replace what’s left behind  
But I’ll be here, tender and kind  

[Bridge]
Sometimes love can disappear  
But I’ll be standing always near  

[Outro]
Before the next teardrop shows  
I’ll be the one who always knows

title: My Eyes Adored You
lyrics:
[Verse]
From across the crowded room  
I watched you bloom from girl to tune  
You never saw the love I gave  
But still, I followed like a wave  

[Chorus]
My eyes adored you  
Though you never really knew  
Every step you took away  
Was written in my heart to stay  

[Verse]
I held the silence like a prayer  
A love so deep I wouldn’t dare  
To say the words, to speak the truth  
That you were all my vanished youth  

[Bridge]
Now time has passed, and still I see  
That part of you lives on in me  

[Outro]
My eyes adored you every day  
Even as you walked away

title: Silly Love Songs
lyrics:
[Verse]
You said the world has had enough  
Of all this sugar-coated stuff  
But I believe in melodies  
That bring us down to bended knees  

[Chorus]
What's wrong with silly love songs?  
They’ve kept me warm when nights were long  
I’d sing them loud, I’d sing them true  
If it means I can sing to you  

[Verse]
I’ve seen the cynics roll their eyes  
But I’d rather chase butterflies  
With every note and foolish line  
I find a way to make you mine  

[Bridge]
So let them laugh, let them tease  
I’ll write you love songs till I cease  

[Outro]
What’s wrong with singing how I feel?  
Silly or not, this love is real

title: Don't Go Breaking My Heart
lyrics:
[Verse]
I gave you all, the whole of me  
Wrapped in love and harmony  
But every time you turn away  
I feel my soul begin to sway  

[Chorus]
Don’t go breaking my heart  
We’re not meant to fall apart  
Hold me close and say you’ll stay  
Don’t let this love just drift away  

[Verse]
I’m not the kind to beg or plead  
But you’re the only one I need  
We’ve come too far, we’ve seen too much  
To let it slip without a touch  

[Bridge]
I’m not asking for perfection  
Just a little true connection  

[Outro]
Don’t go breaking what we’ve made  
Don’t let the light of love fade

title: Disco Lady
instrumentation: soul rhythm section, smooth male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
She walks into the lighted floor  
The crowd can’t help but want some more  
She spins like fire in silver shoes  
And every heartbeat finds its cues  

[Chorus]
Disco lady, shine so bright  
You're the rhythm of the night  
Move your body, feel the groove  
Make the whole wide dance floor move  

[Verse]
With every sway, she casts a spell  
No one moves the way she dwells  
Glitter falling from her hair  
She floats like magic through the air  

[Bridge]
Underneath the flashing beams  
She turns our dreams into routines  

[Outro]
Disco lady, never slow  
Take us where we need to go

title: December, 1963 (Oh, What a Night)
lyrics:
[Verse]
Oh what a night, so full of charm  
Your touch, your voice, your warming arms  
I never knew love moved that fast  
But still I wish it all could last  

[Chorus]
Oh what a night, a flash of flame  
Everything changed when you said my name  
A memory that won’t let go  
From long ago, I still feel the glow  

[Verse]
You smiled and time began to freeze  
With every breath, you brought me peace  
The stars came down just for us two  
And lit a path that felt brand new  

[Bridge]
Even now, the years have passed  
But that one night, it still holds fast  

[Outro]
Oh what a night, we danced so free  
And that night still lives in me

title: Play That Funky Music
lyrics:
[Verse]
I used to stand against the wall  
Too shy to dance, too scared to fall  
But then the band began to play  
And funk just swept my fear away  

[Chorus]
Play that funky music, loud and proud  
Let it shake up every crowd  
Get down with rhythm, lose control  
Let that funky beat rock your soul  

[Verse]
The bass was low, the groove was tight  
I found my fire, I found my light  
Now I don’t care what others see  
This funky sound is setting me free  

[Bridge]
Every note a liberation  
Pure, unfiltered celebration  

[Outro]
Play that funky music, all night long  
We’ll keep grooving till the dawn

title: Tonight's the Night (Gonna Be Alright)
instrumentation: acoustic guitar, soft drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
The candles glow, the room is still  
My heart is racing, hard to chill  
You look at me with knowing eyes  
Tonight, no fear, no more goodbyes  

[Chorus]
Tonight’s the night, it’s gonna be alright  
We’ll move so slow, then hold on tight  
The stars outside will fade away  
While in your arms I choose to stay  

[Verse]
We've waited long, we've crossed the line  
This love is yours, this love is mine  
Let music lead us through the dark  
Till morning brings a brand new spark  

[Bridge]
There’s no need to talk or run  
Our hearts are sure, our time’s begun  

[Outro]
Tonight’s the night, come close to me  
Let love unfold so tenderly

title: I Just Want To Be Your Everything
instrumentation: disco beats, strings, falsetto male vocals
lyrics:
[Intro]
I don’t need a world of gold  
Just your hand when nights are cold  

[Verse]
If you gave your heart to me  
I’d be the light you’d always see  
Through every high, through every low  
I'd be the one who’d never go  

[Chorus]
I just want to be your everything  
Your sunrise, your song to sing  
When the world feels far and wide  
I'll be the one right by your side  

[Verse]
No treasure shines like your smile  
You make this life feel so worthwhile  
With every beat, my heart will show  
I’m loving you more than you know  

[Bridge]
You’re the dream I never planned  
Now I’m reaching for your hand  

[Outro]
I just want to be your everything  
Forever more, through everything

title: Best of My Love
instrumentation: funky bassline, harmonized female vocals, brass
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every touch, every sigh  
You lift me up, you take me high  
There’s no shadow, no disguise  
Just the sparkle in your eyes  

[Chorus]
You get the best of my love  
Sent from the stars above  
No hesitation, no regret  
You're the one I won’t forget  

[Verse]
When I’m with you, the world stands still  
You turn my silence into thrill  
You take the gray and make it gold  
A love like this is brave and bold  

[Bridge]
You make me sing, you make me dance  
Gave my heart a second chance  

[Outro]
You get the best of everything  
My love, my life, my offering

title: Evergreen (Love Theme from A Star Is Born)
instrumentation: orchestral strings, soft piano, female vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Love is soft as petals fall  
A whisper strong, yet standing tall  
It takes no shape, it speaks no word  
But in your gaze, it’s always heard  

[Chorus]
Evergreen, this love of ours  
Through darkest nights and blooming hours  
It never fades, it never fears  
It grows through time, through joy and tears  

[Verse]
We don’t need the stars to shine  
Your voice is more than any sign  
With every look, with every breath  
You bring me life, you silence death  

[Bridge]
Hearts may break and seasons end  
But we remain, like sky and wind  

[Outro]
Evergreen, and ever true  
This love will always lead me to you

title: Angel in Your Arms
instrumentation: soulful vocals, electric guitar, steady rhythm
lyrics:
[Verse]
You thought I'd wait while you were gone  
But darling, I’m not made of stone  
While you were out, I found a hand  
That held me like you never planned  

[Chorus]
The angel in your arms last night  
Was somewhere else out of your sight  
You played with fire, now feel the flame  
Your angel’s learned to play the game  

[Verse]
I cried alone too many days  
Watched love just slowly slip away  
But now I know what I deserve  
And someone gave me every word  

[Bridge]
You taught me how to walk away  
So don’t act shocked I didn’t stay  

[Outro]
The angel in your arms is gone  
But I’m still dancing, moving on

title: Shadow Dancing
instrumentation: disco rhythm, soft synths, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
You move like mist across the floor  
And I can’t take it anymore  
You're here and gone, a mystery  
But still you pull the breath from me  

[Chorus]
Shadow dancing, hearts romancing  
Lost in time and second glancing  
I chase your light and feel your heat  
But all I hold are restless beats  

[Verse]
Each step you take, the world goes still  
My body moves against its will  
I reach for you but find the night  
Still I keep dancing to your light  

[Bridge]
You haunt the rhythm of my mind  
A ghost I’m hoping still to find  

[Outro]
Shadow dancing, fading slow  
You're the flame I'll always know

title: Night Fever
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the city sleeps, I rise  
With disco fire in my eyes  
The pulse begins beneath my feet  
And suddenly I feel complete  

[Chorus]
Night fever, it’s calling me  
Moving through the melody  
Heartbeat syncs with every light  
We come alive in endless night  

[Verse]
Glitter raining from above  
Caught inside this rhythm of love  
There’s no tomorrow, just the beat  
Where strangers find their passion sweet  

[Bridge]
In the dark we find our truth  
Dancing like we’ve found our youth  

[Outro]
Night fever, don’t fade away  
You’re the fire that makes me stay

title: You Light Up My Life
lyrics:
[Verse]
So many nights I lived in gray  
Lost in silence, turned away  
Then your voice came shining through  
And suddenly, I knew it’s you  

[Chorus]
You light up my life  
Through every shadow, every strife  
With just your touch, I see it clear  
That love like yours is always near  

[Verse]
You gave me hope when I had none  
Turned lonely battles into sun  
The world is bright because you’re here  
You chased away the last of fear  

[Bridge]
Your love's the song I longed to hear  
The only truth that draws me near  

[Outro]
You light up my life each day  
With every word you say

title: Stayin Alive
lyrics:
[Verse]
Woke up with the city in my chest  
Dodging trouble, trying to do my best  
They knock me down, but I don’t fall  
Got rhythm running through it all  

[Chorus]
Ah, ah, ah, stayin’ alive  
In a world that cuts like a knife  
Through the fire, I survive  
With every step, I come alive  

[Verse]
The street’s a jungle, no disguise  
But I can see it in my eyes  
That I was made to take the heat  
And keep on movin’ to the beat  

[Bridge]
You can't stop a soul on fire  
When it's rising, climbing higher  

[Outro]
Ah, ah, ah, stayin’ alive  
I’m the reason dreams revive

title: Kiss You All Over
instrumentation: soft rock guitar, smooth male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
I see the hunger in your eyes  
Like summer heat in moonlit skies  
You draw me in, you burn me slow  
And I can’t stop, I won’t let go  

[Chorus]
I want to kiss you all over  
Till the night turns into day  
Feel your fire pull me closer  
Till the stars all drift away  

[Verse]
Each touch a spark, a wordless flame  
We move like thunder with no name  
You breathe me in, I breathe you out  
And all we are is love and doubt  

[Bridge]
In every kiss, I lose control  
But find a place that makes me whole  

[Outro]
I want to kiss you all over  
And hold you through the light

title: My Sharona
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every look, it pulls me in  
You're the fire beneath my skin  
Fast and loud, you steal the show  
I can't stop, I can't let go  

[Chorus]
My Sharona, heart attack  
You knock me down and pull me back  
You're the rhythm in my veins  
Driving me a little insane  

[Verse]
Every move, a wicked beat  
You dance like chaos on the street  
You're the rush I chase each night  
My wild addiction, my delight  

[Bridge]
Say the word, I'll lose control  
You’ve got a grip upon my soul  

[Outro]
My Sharona, take me high  
You're the reason I can't lie

title: Bad Girls
lyrics:
[Verse]
They walk the line, heels to the street  
With every glance, they own the beat  
No rules, no chains, just flashing eyes  
They live beneath the city skies  

[Chorus]
Bad girls, dancing through the fire  
Turning danger into desire  
You can’t tame what moves that fast  
They burn too bright, they never last  

[Verse]

title: Le Freak

title: Do Ya Think I'm Sexy?
lyrics:
[Verse]
You see me there, across the floor

title: Reunited
instrumentation: slow tempo, duet vocals, soft keys
lyrics:
[Verse]
I thought the end had come and gone  
But here we are, where we belong  
The silence broke with just one call

Time apart just proved the truth

[Outro]

title: Call Me
instrumentation: new wave guitar, synths, strong vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the lights go down and I feel the chill  
I hear your voice and I get that thrill

[Chorus]

title: Another Brick in the Wall, Part II
instrumentation: funky bass, children’s chorus, electric guitar
lyrics:
[Verse]
We don’t need your iron rules  
Turning hearts into tools  
No more lies wrapped in disguise  
We see the truth behind your eyes  

[Chorus]
Hey! Leave us kids alone  
We’ve found our minds, we’ve grown  
We’re more than bricks, more than drones  
We’re building voices of our own  

[Verse]
Your walls are cracking at the seams  
You stole our fire, stole our dreams  
But we’re not pawns, we’ve learned to fight  
Our silence now becomes our light  

[Bridge]
Knowledge grows where fear was sown  
We break the chains we used to own  

[Outro]
We’re not just bricks in your wall  
We’re the ones who’ll watch it fall

title: Magic
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every time you walk my way  
Colors dance, the skies turn gray  
But with your smile, the sun breaks through  
You’ve got a spell, I fall into  

[Chorus]
You got the magic, can’t explain  
Turning clouds into champagne  
When you’re near, the world aligns  
And every clock forgets the time  

[Verse]
You don’t speak, but I can hear  
A melody that draws me near  
With just a touch, you shift my soul  
You take the broken and make it whole  

[Bridge]
I used to doubt the stars above  
Now they spell your name with love  

[Outro]
You got the magic, now I see  
You’re the wonder meant for me

title: Rock with You
instrumentation: funk groove, soft percussion, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Close your eyes, forget the day  
Let the rhythm sweep us away  
No need to speak, just feel the flow  
Hold me tight and let it go  

[Chorus]
Rock with you, through the night  
In your arms, it all feels right  
Let the music be our guide  
And we’ll dance till morning light  

[Verse]
Your heartbeat matches every beat  
With every step, we feel complete  
The world is gone, it’s just us two  
I’m lost in love when I'm with you  

[Bridge]
Don’t stop, don’t let it fade  
We’re in the magic we just made  

[Outro]
Rock with you, in endless sway  
Let’s keep dancing night away

title: Do That To Me One More Time
instrumentation: piano, soft instrumentation, gentle female vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Do that to me one more time  
Touch my heart and make it rhyme  
You know the way to pull me near  
Whisper love I long to hear  

[Chorus]
Do that to me once again  
Let me feel like I did then  
Every kiss, a sacred vow  
I need your magic here and now  

[Verse]
The way you hold me in the night  
Turns every shadow into light  
You make the stillness start to sing  
With just the warmth your hands can bring  

[Bridge]
One more time won’t be enough  
To show the depth of all this love  

[Outro]
So do that to me once again  
Let forever now begin

title: Bette Davis Eyes
lyrics:
[Verse]
She’s got mystery in her glance  
Like a phantom in a trance  
Every move, a silent game  
She plays with charm, never shame  

[Chorus]
She’s got Bette Davis eyes  
Cool and sharp, no disguise  
You won’t know what’s on her mind  
But she’ll haunt you every time  

[Verse]
Her words are soft, but cut like steel  
She takes what’s hers, makes you feel  
Like love’s a gamble she can win  
And you fall before you begin  

[Bridge]
You can run, but can’t resist  
She’s a dream you won’t dismiss  

[Outro]
She’s got Bette Davis eyes  
And the truth behind the lies

title: Endless Love
lyrics:
[Verse]
My love, there’s no start or end  
You're my forever, my closest friend  
From morning light to midnight stars  
I carry you, no matter how far  

[Chorus]
You're my endless love  
A gift sent from above  
In every breath, in every sigh  
You're the reason I survive  

[Verse]
We walk through time, hand in hand  
On shifting seas, on golden sand  
No test too hard, no night too long  
With you, I’ve found where I belong  

[Bridge]
No one else could take your place  
You’re my shelter, my saving grace  

[Outro]
You're my endless love  
Forever’s not enough

title: Lady
instrumentation: piano, acoustic guitar, soft male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Lady, you came into my life  
Soft and calm, a break from strife  
You turned my night into a song  
A place where hearts belong  

[Chorus]
Lady, you are my light  
The one who makes wrong feel right  
In your arms I find my truth  
You are my dream, my fountain of youth  

[Verse]
With every word you speak my name  
You set my world alight with flame  
You're every wish I’ve ever made  
A love that will not fade  

[Bridge]
I was lost till you appeared  
Now I hold what I once feared  

[Outro]
Lady, stay and never leave  
In you I always will believe

title: (Just Like) Starting Over
lyrics:
[Verse]
We’ve been through storms, we’ve faced the rain  
But now we’re here, we’ve shed the pain  
It’s time to breathe, to laugh again  
To let the sunshine in  

[Chorus]
It’s just like starting over  
Learning love beneath the clover  
Every kiss a brand new spark  
We’re lighting fire in the dark  

[Verse]
We took the long and winding road  
Carried burdens, heavy load  
But now we stand with open hearts  
Ready for a brand new start  

[Bridge]
Every touch feels like the first  
Every silence quenches thirst  

[Outro]
It’s just like starting over  
With the one I’ve always known

title: Jessie's Girl
instrumentation: electric guitar, energetic rhythm, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Saw her smile and felt the sting  
She's got everything, every little thing  
But she’s with him and I pretend  
That I’m just another friend  

[Chorus]
I wish I had Jessie’s girl  
The way she laughs, she lights my world  
It’s tough to hide what I feel inside  
When he’s the one right by her side  

[Verse]
We hang out, but I feel the ache  
Watching him make the moves I’d make  
She doesn’t know what she could mean  
To someone caught in between  

[Bridge]
I’m not trying to steal or lie  
But I dream about her every night  

[Outro]
I wish I had Jessie’s girl  
But some dreams never unfurl

title: Physical
lyrics:
[Verse]
I see you looking, standing there  
The heat is rising in the air  
Forget the talk, forget the games  
Let's feed this fire, spark the flames  

[Chorus]
Let’s get physical, feel the rush  
Move your body, feel the hush  
No more thinking, just the beat  
Let our shadows find the heat  

[Verse]
Every breath pulls me in

Let's burn beneath these disco skies  

[Bridge]
We don’t need to speak at all  
The rhythm is our only call  

[Outro]
