Underneath the neon light

title: Eye of the Tiger
instrumentation: guitar riffs, driving drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Rising up, back on the street  
Chasing dreams that won’t retreat  
Took my hits, stood my ground  
Now I’m back for another round  

[Chorus]
It's the eye of the tiger, the thrill of the fight  
Rising up to the challenge of our might  
With the last known survivor stalking his prey  
In the night, we find our way  

[Verse]
Went the distance, paid the cost  
Fought through doubt, loved and lost  
But now I see what I can be  
A fire forged in destiny  

[Bridge]
Every scar a memory  
Of how I fought to still believe  

[Outro]
It’s the eye of the storm I crave  
The strength to rise, the will to brave

title: I Love Rock 'N Roll
lyrics:
[Intro]
Cranked the jukebox, dropped a dime  
Found a rhythm, felt the time  

[Verse]
Saw you standin’ near the light  
Leather jacket, eyes so bright  
You had a swagger, I had the song  
We both knew we'd get along  

[Chorus]
I love rock 'n roll  
Blast it loud and lose control  
Turn it up, let the rhythm roll  
Yeah, I love rock 'n roll  

[Verse]
You moved close, the sparks took flight  
We owned that dive all Friday night  
You raised your glass, I played my part  
Two rebels tearing up the dark  

[Bridge]
It ain’t about the fame or gold  
It’s that fire you can’t hold  

[Outro]
I love rock 'n roll  
It’s the beat that saves my soul

title: Ebony and Ivory
lyrics:
[Verse]
Side by side, in black and white  
Different notes but shared delight  
We play a tune both strong and clear  
Together, we bring harmony near  

[Chorus]
Ebony and ivory  
Living in perfect harmony  
On the keys of life we play  
Building bridges every day

You bring the depth, I bring the shine

Our voices blend, our hearts align  
In this song that’s yours and mine  

[Bridge]
Let no one split what’s meant to be  
We’re one in soul and melody  

[Outro]
Ebony and ivory  
The world could learn from you and me

title: Centerfold
instrumentation: rock band, rhythmic claps, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Used to be the girl next door  
Now she's lighting up the store  
Caught me by surprise, I swear  
When I saw her picture there  

[Chorus]
My angel is a centerfold  
Truth untold, a story bold  
She changed the rules, flipped the page  
Turned my past into a stage

We shared dreams and playground games  
Now she's dancing under lights and fame  
I'm stuck in time, she's moving fast  
And I'm just a ghost from her past  

[Bridge]
I don’t blame her for the show  
But part of me can’t let it go  

[Outro]
My sweet surprise in glossy fold

title: Every Breath You Take
instrumentation: sting’s vocals, clean guitar, steady bassline
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every move you make, I feel the air

I trace your voice inside my head  
Through empty rooms and words unsaid  

[Chorus]
Every breath you take  
I feel the ache, I feel the break

The love we had, it lingers still  
A ghost that walks against my will  
Each step you take, I fall behind  
A prisoner of a fading mind  

[Bridge]
I reach for light in darkened space  
But only find your vanished face  

[Outro]
Every breath you take, I see  
You're always just ahead of me

title: Billie Jean
instrumentation: synth bassline, tight rhythm, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
She danced into the room like flame  
With eyes that burned and spoke my name  
She whispered secrets with a smile  
And stayed with me a little while  

[Chorus]
Billie Jean is not my love  
She's a shadow rising from above  
The child, she says, belongs to me

[Outro]

title: Flashdance...What a Feeling
lyrics:
[Intro]

Lights are low but my heart's alive

Chasing fire through the night

title: Down Under
lyrics:

And every breeze is brave and cold

[Outro]

Where hearts are loud like rolling thunder

title: Beat It
instrumentation: electric guitar, rock drums, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
They push and pull, they start the fire

[Outro]

title: When Doves Cry
instrumentation: synths, drum machine, no bass, expressive vocals

[Verse]

Is it pain or is it pride?  
When doves cry, I feel denied

[Outro]
No more tears left to supply  
This is how it feels when doves cry

title: What's Love Got to Do with It
instrumentation: synths, clean guitar, strong female vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
You hold my hand, but not my soul

My heart’s not made for games like this

[Outro]

title: Say Say Say

[Verse]
Say what you want, but don’t pretend

[Chorus]

[Outro]

title: Footloose

[Verse]

title: Against All Odds (Take a Look at Me Now)

[Verse]

[Outro]

title: Careless Whisper

[Verse]
We danced too close, we moved too fast

But secrets whispered through the night

[Chorus]

[Outro]

title: Like a Virgin

[Verse]
I walked through fire, played the game

Everything felt raw and new  

[Chorus]

[Outro]

title: Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go

[Verse]

[Bridge]

[Outro]
Wake me up, don’t say goodbye  
Let’s dance beneath the morning sky

title: I Want to Know What Love Is
instrumentation: power ballad instrumentation, strong male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
I've climbed these mountains made of doubt

I’ve wandered through the endless night  
Still searching for that sacred light  

[Chorus]
I want to know what love is

[Outro]

title: I Feel for You

[Verse]

[Chorus]

[Outro]

title: That's What Friends Are For

Through every storm, through every tear  
You stand beside me, year to year  

[Chorus]
That’s what friends are for  
To lift you up, to give you more  
Through highs and lows, through thick and thin

[Bridge]

But you’ll always be my friend  

[Outro]

title: Say You, Say Me
lyrics:
[Verse]
Say you, say me  
Let’s not let this moment flee  
We’ve come so far, hearts on display  
Now don’t let silence steal away  

[Chorus]
Say it loud, say it true  
The world fades when I’m with you  
Say you, say me, no disguise  
Let love live behind our eyes  

[Verse]
We walked alone too many nights  
Now here we are beneath the lights  
No need to guess, no need to hide  
Just speak the words we hold inside  

[Bridge]
One voice, one time, one vow  
Say it to me here and now  

[Outro]
Say you, say me, say we  
This love was always meant to be

title: I Miss You
lyrics:
[Verse]
I still hear your voice at dawn  
Though the night keeps moving on  
Your shadow dances on my wall  
And I still wait for you to call  

[Chorus]
I miss you more than I can say  
Each breath I take fades into gray  
The world goes on, but I stay still  
Caught in dreams I can’t fulfill  

[Verse]
The laughter lingers in the air  
But when I reach, you’re never there  
I hold the pieces of our time  
Trying to fit what’s left behind

[Verse]
I was blind, couldn’t see the way  
Every step just led astray  
But then you came, and skies were clear  
The truth was always waiting near  

[Chorus]
I saw the sign, and it opened my eyes  
Told me where my future lies  
No more games, no more disguise  
Now I finally realize  

[Verse]
You broke the chain, you lit the spark  
Turned the shadows into art  
I won’t look back, I’ve found my song  
Where I belong, where I’ve been strong  

[Bridge]
The road was dark, but now it’s lit  
With every truth I used to quit  

[Outro]
I saw the sign, and now I know  
It's time to rise, it's time to grow

title: I Swear
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the night grows cold and long  
I’ll be there, holding strong  
You can trust in what I say  
I’ll never walk away  

[Chorus]
I swear, by the moon and the stars above  
To guard you with my endless love  
Through every high and every low  
I’ll be the one you’ll always know  

[Verse]
Even when the world turns gray  
I’ll be your sun through every day  
My heart belongs to only you  
In every word, in all I do  

[Bridge]
Time may change the world we see  
But it won't change what's in me  

[Outro]
I swear, forever starts with you  
And every vow I make is true

title: I'll Make Love to You
lyrics:
[Verse]
Candlelight and softest rain  
I’ll take away your every pain  
No need to speak, just take my hand  
I’ll show you how I understand  

[Chorus]
I’ll make love to you  
Like you’ve never known it’s true  
Hold you close, feel you near  
Whisper words you need to hear  

[Verse]
Every moment, slow and deep  
You’re the dream I want to keep  
Let’s lose the world and take our time  
Our rhythm falling into rhyme  

[Bridge]
This night’s for you, just say the word  
And I’ll give you all you’ve ever heard  

[Outro]
I’ll make love to you tonight  
Until we rise in morning light

title: The Power of Love
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the world feels far and cold  
You’re the warmth I need to hold  
Every heartbeat, every sigh  
You lift me up, you help me fly  

[Chorus]
That’s the power of love  
Stronger than the stars above  
It carries me when I fall  
And answers every silent call  

[Verse]
Through the fire and through the rain  
You’re the cure for every pain  
You don’t speak, but I still hear  
Your love’s the voice I hold so dear  

[Bridge]
In your eyes, I find the light  
That makes the darkest moments bright  

[Outro]
That’s the power I believe  
The love you give, the love I need

title: Hero
lyrics:
[Verse]
There’s a fire in every soul  
Waiting quietly to take control  
In the stillness of the night  
A hero rises into the light  

[Chorus]
You don’t need to wear a crown  
To lift someone who’s falling down  
Look inside, and you will know  
You’ve had the strength to grow  

[Verse]
Through the tears and aching fear  
You’ve been the one to persevere  
Not for fame or glory’s call  
But just to rise after you fall  

[Bridge]
It’s not in words or grand display  
It’s in the hearts you guide each day  

[Outro]
There’s a hero in you, it's true  
And the world is better because of you

title: Gangsta's Paradise
lyrics:
[Verse]
As I walk through shadows of my past  
I hear the questions people ask  
Is this the life I chose to lead?  
Or just a world that plants the seed?  

[Chorus]
Livin’ in a gangsta’s paradise  
Where wrong feels right, and truth rolls dice  
Every choice a loaded gun  
And peace is something we outrun  

[Verse]
I’ve seen the pain behind the pride  
Watched too many brothers die  
We hustle hard to just survive  
But sometimes wonder why we’re alive  

[Bridge]
Don’t judge the streets if you ain’t been  
They raised me up, but pulled me in  

[Outro]
Gangsta’s paradise, it’s real  
Where silence is the deal

title: Waterfalls
lyrics:
[Verse]
She walks the edge, afraid to fall  
But chasing dreams beyond the wall  
She’s reaching out for something more  
But can’t unlock the broken door  

[Chorus]
Don’t go chasing waterfalls  
Stick to the rivers and the calls  
That guide you home, that bring you peace  
Don’t trade your truth for a release  

[Verse]
He runs the night with hungry eyes  
But never sees the morning rise  
He’s lost in fog, in search of flame  
But can’t remember his own name  

[Bridge]
The current pulls you far and wide  
But still the truth is deep inside  

[Outro]
Don’t go chasing what won’t stay  
Find the light and walk your way

title: Creep
lyrics:
[Verse]
I keep it cool, I play it low  
But deep inside, I need to know  
If you’re with me, or just pretend  
I can't keep playing, let's not pretend  

[Chorus]
So I creep, just to see  
What’s behind your secrecy  
You say you love me, but I doubt  
When silence speaks louder than shout  

[Verse]
You stay out late, you dodge my gaze  
But I still hope it’s just a phase  
I tell myself it’s all in my head  
But I replay every word you said  

[Bridge]
Loving you should make me rise  
Not question truth behind your eyes  

[Outro]
So I creep, because I fear  
That love’s not really here

title: Kiss from a Rose
lyrics:
[Verse]
There was a time, I walked alone  
But then you came and changed the tone  
A gentle voice, a crimson light  
You pulled me through the endless night  

[Chorus]
Like a kiss from a rose  
Soft and sharp, the way love goes  
You bring the cold and then the heat  
A contradiction so complete  

[Verse]
Your love is deep, your touch divine  
It lingers long beyond the line  
Of what I thought that love could be  
You bloomed and took the heart of me  

[Bridge]
With every breath, you draw me near  
I crave the danger and the fear  

[Outro]
Like a kiss from a rose again  
You're my joy and my pain

title: On Bended Knee
lyrics:
[Verse]
We said some things we can’t erase  
But I still long to see your face  
I played the fool, I pushed away  
Now I pray for one more day  

[Chorus]
On bended knee, I plead  
You’re the only heart I need  
I’ll rewrite the words we said  
And bring this love back from the dead  

[Verse]
I took for granted what was true  
Now every night, I dream of you  
Don’t walk away, don’t close that door  
I swear I won’t hurt you anymore  

[Bridge]
Let me show what love can be  
If you put your trust in me  

[Outro]
On bended knee, I cry  
For one last chance before goodbye

title: Macarena (Bayside Boys Remix)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hey Maca-Macarena!

[Verse]
She’s got the moves that light the floor  
Turns and twists, we ask for more  
Hands up high, hips so clean  
Dance like a queen, you know what I mean  

[Chorus]
Hey Maca-Macarena (Ayy!)  
Dance all night with Macarena  
Wave your hands, turn around  
Now bring it back down to the ground  

[Verse]
All the boys stop when she’s near  
She’s got the style, she’s got no fear  
Shake to the left, slide to the right  
Macarena’s got it locked tonight  

[Outro]
Hey Maca-Macarena! (One more time!)  
Hey Maca-Macarena!

title: One Sweet Day
artist: Mariah Carey and Boyz II Men
lyrics:
[Verse]
I never got to say goodbye  
But you still live beyond the sky  
Each tear I cry, I cry for two  
One for me, and one for you  

[Chorus]
One sweet day, we’ll meet again  
Beyond the hurt, beyond the end  
Till then I’ll hold you in my prayer  
And feel your love still in the air  

[Verse]
Your voice still whispers through the breeze  
You bring my busy heart to ease  
I know you watch from up above  
Guiding me with quiet love  

[Bridge]
Time may heal, but won’t erase  
Your smile, your light, your warm embrace  

[Outro]
One sweet day, I’ll find your face  
And feel again your softest grace

title: Because You Loved Me
lyrics:
[Verse]
You were the strength I never found  
The one who kept my feet on ground  
When storms came rushing through the door  
You gave me wings, you made me soar  

[Chorus]
Because you loved me, I found grace  
In every shadow, in every place  
You believed when no one tried  
You stood behind me, arms open wide  

[Verse]
You gave me hope when dreams felt far  
You taught me who I truly are  
And even when I lost my way  
You held my hand, you chose to stay  

[Bridge]
Every tear and every mile  
You were there to make me smile  

[Outro]
Because you loved me, I still stand  
With all I am, by your hand

title: Nobody Knows
lyrics:
[Verse]
I wear a smile, I play the part  
But no one sees my broken heart  
Behind these eyes, there’s rain and flame  
A world that never feels the same  

[Chorus]
Nobody knows the tears I hide  
The battles waged deep inside  
They see the light, they miss the gray  
They never hear the words I say  

[Verse]
I laugh too loud, I joke, I shine  
But pain walks close, it mirrors mine  
I scream in silence every night  
Still holding on with all my might  

[Bridge]
If someone asked, I’d just pretend  
But I still hope that pain will end  

[Outro]
Nobody knows, but I still fight  
To make it through another night

title: Always Be My Baby
lyrics:
[Verse]
We said goodbye, but hearts don’t lie  
And time can’t make this feeling die  
Though distance grows and seasons change  
There’s something that will stay the same  

[Chorus]
You’ll always be my baby  
Even when the world turns crazy  
Our song won’t fade, it won’t erase  
I’ll always feel your warm embrace  

[Verse]
We took a path we couldn’t see  
But love still holds the memory  
You were my first, you’ll be my last  
A present bound to all my past  

[Bridge]
If you ever need to find your way  
I’ll be here every day  

[Outro]
You’ll always be my baby, true  
No matter what we’re going through

title: Something About The Way You Look Tonight
lyrics:
[Verse]  
There’s a calm in your eyes, a light so rare  
Like a song I forgot was always there  
When you walk in the room, the world takes note  
Every heart begins to float  

[Chorus]  
There’s something about the way you look tonight  
Like a fire that turns the dark to light  
It’s not just beauty, it’s something more  
You open windows, you unlock doors  

[Verse]  
The stars get quiet when you smile  
You make the moment worth the while  
I can’t explain what makes it true  
But everything is right with you  

[Bridge]  
You don’t even know the spell you cast  
But time stands still when you walk past  

[Outro]  
Yeah, something about the way you look tonight  
Takes my breath and makes it right

title: Candle in the Wind
lyrics:
[Verse]  
Goodbye to the flame that never swayed  
You danced through storms, but never stayed  
The world applauded from their seats  
But never heard your heartbeat  

[Chorus]  
You were a candle in the wind  
Burning bright, then dim again  
We watched you shine and fade away  
And wished you’d found a place to stay  

[Verse]  
They dressed your name in silver praise  
But never saw your quiet days  
You gave your light, then slipped from view  
And left the night still missing you  

[Bridge]  
Fame is cold and time moves fast  
But your memory will always last  

[Outro]  
Still a candle in the wind  
Still the voice that sang within

title: Foolish Games
lyrics:
[Verse]
You touched my heart, then walked away  
Left me bleeding words I couldn't say  
I gave you love, I played it true  
But still you cut me through and through  

[Chorus]
These foolish games you play  
Turn sunshine into gray  
I stood right here and lost the fight  
While you danced into the night  

[Verse]
You loved me with a stranger's smile  
Made me feel small all the while  
I wore your hurt like second skin  
Just hoping love would let me in  

[Bridge]
But love don’t live where lies begin  
It only hurts when you pretend  

[Outro]
These foolish games are done  
I’m walking toward the sun

title: You Were Meant for Me
lyrics:
[Verse]  
I pour my coffee, tie my shoes  
But mornings always bring the blues  
The way you laughed still haunts my mind  
Like a clock I can’t rewind  

[Chorus]  
You were meant for me, I know it's true  
In every shadow, I still see you  
I try to move, I try to be  
But nothing fits like you and me  

[Verse]  
I hear our song on distant streets  
Where we once danced with careless feet  
Now I walk alone in time  
Chasing echoes of your rhyme  

[Bridge]  
I guess fate played its hand too soon  
Left me talking to the moon  

[Outro]  
You were meant for me, can’t you see?  
You're the piece that’s missing from me

title: I'll Be Missing You
lyrics:
[Verse]
Every step I take, I feel your name  
Whispers through the silent frame  
You were the light that made me see  
Now all that's left is memory  

[Chorus]
I’ll be missing you each day  
Though you’re gone, you still stay  
In my heart, you never fade  
Your love in every note I’ve played  

[Verse]
The laughs we shared, the roads we walked  
The midnight talks, the dreams we talked  
Now I search the sky for signs  
Of your soul beyond the lines  

[Bridge]
I’d give it all to hold you close  
But I still carry what matters most  

[Outro]
I’ll be missing you always  
Till I see you again someday

title: Un-Break My Heart
instrumentation: orchestral strings, piano, strong female vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
Don't leave me here with silent cries  
With shattered dreams and endless whys  
You tore the page, you closed the book  
But I still ache with every look  

[Chorus]
Un-break my heart, rewind the pain  
Bring back love like falling rain  
Undo the tears, restore the light  
Hold me again through the night  

[Verse]
Each day I wake, I feel the space  
Where once I found your warm embrace  
The nights are long, the bed is cold  
Your touch is all I want to hold  

[Bridge]
If love can fade, then it can grow  
So take me back to what we know  

[Outro]
Un-break my heart, don’t let it end  
Make me believe in us again

title: Can't Nobody Hold Me Down
instrumentation: sampled beat, rap verses, steady rhythm
lyrics:
[Verse]
They try to block me, close the gate  
But I just elevate, escape  
I've got a fire that won’t quit  
Each setback fuels the grit  

[Chorus]
Can’t nobody hold me down  
I rise from underground  
They can doubt, they can hate  
But I create my fate  

[Verse]
They whisper lies, they spread the shade  
But I’m built from what they made  
Every fall just proves my flight  
I bring the storm into the night  

[Bridge]
I keep on moving, I won’t stall  
Even with my back to the wall  

[Outro]
Can’t nobody dim my flame  
I was born to own this game

title: Too Close
lyrics:
[Verse]
We’re just dancing, just pretend  
But every touch begins to bend  
The lines we drew, the words unsaid  
Now spinning inside my head  

[Chorus]
You're standing too close  
Every heartbeat shows  
That I can’t resist the heat  
When your body moves to this beat  

[Verse]
We said it's nothing, we said it's fun  
But now I’m melting in your sun  
Your breath on me, your hands in time  
Got me thinking, crossing the line  

[Bridge]
We’re lost in this song tonight  
But it don’t feel right  

[Outro]
Too close to turn away  
Too close to not stay

title: The Boy Is Mine
lyrics:
[Verse]
I see you watching, trying to claim  
But this heart ain't part of your game  
You think you know what we had  
But girl, you're reading the signs all bad  

[Chorus]
The boy is mine, no room to share  
Don’t act like he was never there  
You can talk, but I won’t budge  
This ain’t a case for you to judge  

[Verse]
He made his choice, it wasn’t you  
Stop pretending it’s not true  
I’m not the one who came too late  
Now you’re just pushing fate  

[Bridge]
You can’t rewrite what’s already done  
He’s with me — you had your run  

[Outro]
The boy is mine, that’s the deal  
Now move on and start to heal

title: You're Still the One
lyrics:
[Verse]
They all said we wouldn’t last  
But we rose from every past  
They tried to pull us far apart  
But you stayed inside my heart  

[Chorus]
You’re still the one I dream about  
Still the one I can’t live without  
Through every trial, we found our grace  
You’re still my calm, my sacred place  

[Verse]
We walked through storms and shining skies  
And never had to wear disguise  
You’ve seen me break, seen me rise  
Still you never left my side  

[Bridge]
Years may change the shape we see  
But not what you still mean to me  

[Outro]
You’re still the one I hold each night  
Still the spark, still the light

title: Truly Madly Deeply
lyrics:
[Verse]
I want to stand with you on mountains  
I want to feel your breath in rain  
I want to hold you close forever  
And never speak your name in vain  

[Chorus]
Truly, madly, deeply I  
Will be yours until I die  
You’re the rhythm in my sleep  
The sacred soul I keep  

[Verse]
When I’m lost, you bring me back  
You’re the compass I never lack  
I’ll be the earth beneath your feet  
And every silence you repeat  

[Bridge]
This love won’t fade, it only grows  
Deeper than the world knows  

[Outro]
Truly, madly, through the storm  
Your love keeps my spirit warm

title: How Do I Live
lyrics:
[Verse]
Without your touch, the world feels still  
I’m walking dreams against my will  
Each second hurts, each breath I fake  
I crumble more with each heartbreak  

[Chorus]
How do I live without your love?  
When all I knew was you above  
The stars don’t shine, the sun won’t rise  
When you’re not here, I close my eyes  

[Verse]
The wind don’t sing, the rain don’t fall  
Your voice was my heart’s only call  
I reach for shadows in the night  
But you’re not there to hold me tight  

[Bridge]
You’re my beginning, you’re my end  
My only truth, my only friend  

[Outro]
How do I live, now that you’re gone?  
Still trying to be strong

title: Believe
lyrics:
[Verse]
No one told me it’d be this hard  
Picking pieces from the shards  
But in the silence, I found grace  
And learned to face my own embrace  

[Chorus]
Do you believe in life after love?  
When all that’s left is not enough  
Still I rise and take the fall  
Even when I lose it all  

[Verse]
I cried a sea, I screamed the night  
But now I walk into the light  
It hurt to let the past just fade  
But I'm stronger than the pain it made  

[Bridge]
Time won’t wait for me to grieve  
So I learn to just believe  

[Outro]
I believe in love again  
Even when I don’t know when

title: No Scrubs
lyrics:
[Verse]
You roll up, but you ain’t real  
Flashing talk like it’s a deal  
But I see through your empty game  
You’ve got style, but not a name  

[Chorus]
No scrubs, no rides for free  
I need someone who’s there for me  
Not a boy who stays behind  
But a man who shows his mind  

[Verse]
You hang around with borrowed shine  
But you can’t even match my line  
I'm not here for sweet disguise  
I want truth behind the eyes  

[Bridge]
You want love? Start with pride  
Not with lies you try to hide  

[Outro]
No scrubs, just move along  
I know my worth—I’m standing strong

title: Angel of Mine
lyrics:
[Verse]
I used to drift without a way  
But you brought light into my day  
You showed me love I’d never known  
And now I never feel alone  

[Chorus]
Angel of mine, you came to me  
Like sunlight breaking through the sea  
With every touch, you helped me grow  
And gave me strength I didn’t know  

[Verse]
Your eyes remind me what is real  
Your love’s the peace I always feel  
You lifted me when I was down  
And placed a halo on my crown  

[Bridge]
You are the wish I didn’t send  
The story with the perfect end  

[Outro]
Angel of mine, don’t fly away  
You’re the reason that I pray

title: Heartbreak Hotel
artist: Whitney Houston feat. Faith Evans and Kelly Price
lyrics:
[Verse]
Checked in alone with tears to spare  
Another night, another stare  
The walls remember every fight  
The silence screams you’re not alright  

[Chorus]
Welcome to Heartbreak Hotel  
Where the pain and memories dwell  
Room for one with love gone wrong  
Stay the night, it won’t be long  

[Verse]
I called your name through static light  
But got no answer, just the night  
You vanished like a fleeting song  
Left me wondering all along  

[Bridge]
Down these halls, we fade, we cry  
No one asks the reason why  

[Outro]
Heartbreak Hotel, where I lay  
Till your ghost fades away

title: ...Baby One More Time
lyrics:
[Verse]
Loneliness is haunting me  
And now I feel the need to plead  
You were the spark that lit my flame  
Now silence echoes out your name  

[Chorus]
Hit me baby one more time  
Say you’re mine and draw the line  
Between the doubt and what we were  
Just bring me back with one sweet word  

[Verse]
The days are slow, the nights too deep  
You’re the dream I can’t keep  
I lost my way when you let go  
But still your name is all I know  

[Bridge]
My heart’s still caught in our old rhyme  
Craving just one final sign  

[Outro]
Baby, call me back again  
Let me feel your love begin

title: Breathe
lyrics:
[Verse]
I've been holding it inside  
Hiding feelings that collide  
But now it's time to let it go  
Let the truth begin to show  

[Chorus]
Just breathe, let it in  
Feel the air beneath your skin  
No more running, no disguise  
Only truth behind these eyes  

[Verse]
The world spins fast, we lose our place  
But peace can come with just one grace  
Slow it down, be here, be still  
Let your soul bend to your will  

[Bridge]
You don't need to know the end  
Only breathe, my love, again  

[Outro]
Breathe with me, don’t pretend  
This is where the healing begins

title: Smooth
lyrics:
[Verse]
Your touch is like a summer flame  
Whispers heat, but plays no game  
You're a rhythm in my veins  
Spinning love like warm champagne  

[Chorus]
You’re so smooth, it’s unreal  
Every move’s a way to feel  
Got me melting in your sound  
With no way to slow me down  

[Verse]
Your body’s jazz, your lips are soul  
Every glance is full control  
I’m dancing under your command  
Like waves obeying land  

[Bridge]
You play me like a tune so sweet  
Got me swaying in the heat  

[Outro]
You're smooth, and I’m your song  
Together we can’t go wrong

title: Maria Maria
lyrics:
[Intro]  
Maria Maria  
She moves like the wind through the night  

[Verse]  
In the heat of the summer she walks with grace  
Eyes full of fire and a softer face  
The rhythm of the streets in every step  
She knows the world, and no regret  

[Chorus]  
Maria Maria, dancing in the rain  
Loving through the struggle, smiling through the pain  
She’s got a soul like a Spanish song  
A melody where hearts belong  

[Verse]  
Raised on stories and dusty roads  
She sings with a voice nobody owns  
Every word she says is true  
Born of struggle, born of view  

[Bridge]  
She don’t need no crown or stage  
Her beauty’s carved from silent rage  

[Outro]  
Maria Maria  
You’ve got the whole world in your name

title: I Wanna Know
instrumentation: R&B slow jam style, male vocals
lyrics:
[Verse]
What makes you smile when you’re alone?  
What breaks your heart you’ve never shown?  
Tell me all you try to hide  
Let me love what’s deep inside  

[Chorus]
I wanna know what moves your soul  
What fills the space and makes you whole  
I wanna be the one you trust  
The voice you hear when days are rough  

[Verse]
Do you cry when no one sees?  
Do you fall down to your knees?  
I’m not afraid to hear your pain  
I’ll stay through sunshine and the rain  

[Bridge]
You don’t need to stand alone  
Let me make your heart my home  

[Outro]
I wanna know and I won’t leave  
Just speak your truth and I’ll believe

title: Everything You Want
lyrics:
[Verse]
He’s got the words you wanna hear  
But not the heart to keep you near  
He makes you laugh, but not for long  
You’re still searching for where you belong  

[Chorus]
I’m everything you want  
The truth you never caught  
While he’s playing make-believe  
I’m the one who’ll never leave  

[Verse]
You chase a dream that fades to grey  
But I’ve been here every day  
Watching you fall through his disguise  
When I could love you without lies  

[Bridge]
Open your eyes, don’t look too far  
The one you need is where you are  

[Outro]
I’m everything you want to feel  
The only love that’s real

title: Hanging By A Moment
instrumentation: electric guitar, melodic vocals, rock drums
lyrics:
[Verse]
Desperate eyes are scanning the sky  
I’m chasing the reasons I feel so alive  
Tumbling fast with no way to land  
Gripping tight with a trembling hand  

[Chorus]
